job_title: Scientist, Computational Biology ( Expertise with R, preferably in a production environment with significant experience Shiny development)
job_text: ['The Client seeks a talented and enthusiastic data scientist to build scientific data products that will be used in the Research and Early Development organization to transform how we make and share decisions on data as we strive for patient benefit.', '', '• Master’s degree or PhD in a relevant discipline with ideally 3 or more years industry experience', '• Excellent project management and communication skills', '• Experience building data products in the scientific domain, including life cycle management and improving user experience based on feedback', '• Enable scientists to make their data FAIR (Findable, Accessible, Interoperable Re-usable)', 'Example Roles and responsibilities', '• Create data visualizations for biologists and chemists to understand and make decisions on experimental data', '• Identify relevant scientific data and integrate it into a knowledge graph.', 'Experience and Education:', '• Expertise with R, preferably in a production environment with significant experience Shiny development.', '• Gather user requirements for new tools to capture and share research results', 'This role will work closely with computational and wet lab scientists to integrate relevant data and build dashboards that will enable drug discovery teams in their work. It will also involve understanding and identifying cases where data generated across the drug discovery process can be made more useful to help teams answer key questions on drug discovery projects.', '• Help grow the BMS R community']

['', 'Strong interpersonal and communication skills', 'knowledge of pure and applied math, ML and DL frameworks, such as Tensorflow, and ML techniques, such as random forest and neural networks, are important.', 'Knowledge of relevant languages, tools and frameworks in AWS environment', 'Ability to work with multiple projects and work streams at one time. Must be able to deliver results based upon project deadlines.', 'Willing to flex daily work schedule to allow for time-zone differences for global team communications', 'Background in ML algorithm development, AI/ML Platforms, Deep Learning, ML Operations in the cloud environment.', 'We are on an exciting journey to build and scale our advanced analytics practice. This role is expected to provide thought leadership around architectural best practices by leveraging experience and current industry trends.\xa0', 'Lead the end-to-end model development lifecycle from data preparation and feature engineering to model deployment and retraining.', 'In this role, you will continuously sharpen your knowledge around the end-to-end model development lifecycle from data preparation and feature engineering to model deployment and retraining. ['Benefits program (Medical, Dental, Vision, 401k, etc.)', 'Professional data engineering experience focused on batch and real time data pipelines using Python and SQLData warehouse (data modeling, programming) using Snowflake,\xa0RDBMS experienceExperience working on a cloud environment, preferably, AWS Cloud Data Warehouse solutions (Snowflake, Redshift)Good interpersonal skills; comfort and competence in dealing with different teams within the organization.Requires an ability to interface with multiple constituent groups and build sustainable relationships.Strong and effective communication skills (verbal and written).Strong analytical, problem-solving skills.A go-getter and a problem solver, with an ability to prioritize, work to deadlines, and work under pressureResults-oriented, flexible, adaptable.Work well independently, and be a team player.Versatile, creative temperament, ability to think out-of-the box while defining sound and practical solutions.Ability to master new skills.Proactive approach to problem solving with effective influencing skills.Familiar with Agile practices and methodologies', 'Data warehouse (data modeling, programming) using Snowflake,\xa0RDBMS experience', 'Results-oriented, flexible, adaptable.', 'Apache Airflow DAG process familiarity', 'Ability to master new skills.', 'Professional data engineering experience focused on batch and real time data pipelines using Python and SQL', 'Flexible schedule', 'Snowflake', 'Requirements', 'Strong analytical, problem-solving skills.', 'A go-getter and a problem solver, with an ability to prioritize, work to deadlines, and work under pressure', 'Versatile, creative temperament, ability to think out-of-the box while defining sound and practical solutions.', 'Requirements:\xa0', 'Requires an ability to interface with multiple constituent groups and build sustainable relationships.', 'We are looking for a Lead/Senior Data Engineer for one of our Dallas area-based clients in the retail industry.\xa0 This engineer will be a part of the Data & Analytics organization, and will initially focus on the merchandising and supply chain domain areas.\xa0 Responsibilities will include building and managing the data pipelines (Data ingest, data transformation, data distribution, quality rules, data storage etc.) for an AWS cloud-based data analytics platform. The candidate will possess strong technical, analytical, programming and critical thinking skills. The ideal candidate will have familiarity with data transformation, data modeling, Master data management, and Meta data management.\xa0 This candidate will work as a lead/senior engineer on an existing team mixed with client engineers, as well as engineers from our offshore development centers, based out of Eastern Europe, and will interact with the client stakeholders.', 'About Us:\xa0', 'Apache Airflow DAG process familiarityUnderstanding of data science and visualization technologies (Hadoop, Spark, Databricks)', 'Familiar with Agile practices and methodologies', 'Opportunity to work on bleeding-edge projectsWork with a highly motivated and dedicated teamCompetitive salaryFlexible scheduleBenefits program (Medical, Dental, Vision, 401k, etc.)Professional development opportunities', 'Experience working on a cloud environment, preferably, AWS Cloud Data Warehouse solutions (Snowflake, Redshift)', 'Work with a highly motivated and dedicated team', 'Opportunity to work on bleeding-edge projects', 'Good interpersonal skills; comfort and competence in dealing with different teams within the organization.', 'Professional development opportunities', 'To learn more about Grid Dynamics, visit\xa0www.griddynamics.com, or follow us on Twitter @GridDynamics.', 'We work in close collaboration with our clients on digital transformation initiatives that span strategy consulting, early prototypes and enterprise-scale delivery of new digital platforms. We help organizations become more agile and create innovative digital products and experiences using deep expertise in emerging technology, top global engineering talent, lean software development practices, and high-performance product culture.\xa0', 'Grid Dynamics is a leading provider of technology consulting, agile co-creation, scalable engineering and data science services for Fortune 500 corporations undergoing digital transformation.\xa0', 'Nice to Have:', 'Python', 'Strong and effective communication skills (verbal and written).', 'Proactive approach to problem solving with effective influencing skills.', 'SQL', 'AWS', 'Headquartered in Silicon Valley with over 1,300 technologists located in engineering delivery centers throughout the US, Central and Eastern Europe, Grid Dynamics has architected and delivered some of the most extensive digital transformation programs in the retail, technology and financial sectors to help its clients win market share, shorten time to market and reduce costs of digital operations on a massive scale.', 'What we offer:', 'Understanding of data science and visualization technologies (Hadoop, Spark, Databricks)', 'Competitive salary', 'Work well independently, and be a team player.']

job_title: Staff Data Engineer - Data Engineering Team
job_text: ['', 'Have a deep understanding of the trade-offs to be considered when designing and delivering data platform based on the end-use case', 'Provide guidance, technical leadership, and mentoring to other members of the team', 'Minimum Requirements', 'PagerDuty is committed to creating a diverse environment and is an equal opportunity employer. PagerDuty does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, parental status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'Whether it’s conducting a retrospective, participating in our bi-annual hack weeks, cranking out a new product feature, supporting our two PagerDuty bands, or doing our day to day work, Dutonians live and breathe these five values every day. Together, we solve real customer issues and fulfill our mission of connecting teams to real-time opportunities and elevate work to the outcomes that matter.', 'We expect you to collaborate with data scientists and full-stack engineers to drive alignment on design patterns and best practices to support the business.', 'PagerDuty is committed to providing reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities in our job application process.\xa0Should you require accommodation, please email\xa0accommodation@pagerduty.com\xa0and we will work with you to meet your accessibility needs.', 'Anticipate technical demands on the data platform based on the organization’s roadmap and systematically drive the evolution of the architecture towards those ends', '- Comprehensive benefits package including: medical, dental, and vision plans for you, your spouse and family', 'Drive and define standards for data engineering across the organization', 'You have 8+ years of experience building, designing, and evolving data architecture for large scale systems\xa0', 'We believe that people do their best in a culture that fosters inclusion, innovation, and success. Our values - Champion the Customer, Take the Lead, Run Together, Ack + Own and Bring Yourself - serve as the foundation of our collaborative and dynamic culture.', "- Opportunities to get involved in PagerDuty's Employee Resource Groups (ERGs) and other\xa0diversity initiatives. ERGs are self-organized, employee-run communities focused on advancing a sense of belonging and inclusion for all - members, advocates, and allies.", '\xa0', 'Our stewardship of the data of many thousands of customers means that a background check is required to join PagerDuty. We will, nonetheless, consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records in a manner consistent with local requirements.', 'Demonstrated experience with data modeling, database design, extract transform load (ETL) processes, working with unstructured data, and cloud-based data infrastructure', 'We’re looking for a staff-level engineer and a proven technical leader passionate about building infrastructure for data scientists to run machine learning models with big data in production successfully.', '- Paid vacation (3 weeks vacation your first year, 4 weeks afterwards) in addition to paid holidays and ample sick leave', 'and we will work with you to meet your accessibility needs.', 'Take the lead to build or architect PagerDuty data platform and work with large sets of historical and real-time data across many product lines', '- Bi-annual company wide hack weeks', 'You have 8+ years of experience building, designing, and evolving data architecture for large scale systems\xa0Experience working with Product teams ensuring a timely deliveryHave a deep understanding of the trade-offs to be considered when designing and delivering data platform based on the end-use caseDemonstrated experience with data modeling, database design, extract transform load (ETL) processes, working with unstructured data, and cloud-based data infrastructureAwareness of and experience with ML processes, technologies, and infrastructure', 'We’re building an inclusive workplace that represents the real, everyday people we support around the world. From how we build our teams to who sits in the boardroom, we hope you can see yourself at PagerDuty.', '- Generous parental leave', 'Awareness of and experience with ML processes, technologies, and infrastructure', 'Experience working with Product teams ensuring a timely delivery', 'To all recruitment agencies:\xa0PagerDuty does not accept agency resumes. Please do not forward resumes to our jobs alias, PagerDuty employees or any other company location. PagerDuty is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.', 'If you are technical, creative, future-focused and excited about fostering an environment amongst our engineers that helps create avenues for success and learning, then this is an excellent opportunity for you.', 'Proactively recommend improvements and new approaches addressing potential systemic pain points and technical debt', 'Take the lead to build or architect PagerDuty data platform and work with large sets of historical and real-time data across many product linesBuild and improve the capabilities of the data platform that enable and accelerate the production of machine learning (ML) based solutionsDrive and define standards for data engineering across the organizationProvide guidance, technical leadership, and mentoring to other members of the teamProactively recommend improvements and new approaches addressing potential systemic pain points and technical debtAnticipate technical demands on the data platform based on the organization’s roadmap and systematically drive the evolution of the architecture towards those ends', 'Build and improve the capabilities of the data platform that enable and accelerate the production of machine learning (ML) based solutions', 'How you contribute to our vision: Key Responsibilities', '- Paid employee volunteer time - 20 hours per year', 'Why We Need You:', 'PagerDuty uses the E-Verify employment verification program.', 'Together we’re building a company that will endure and products people will love for generations to come.', 'PagerDuty is committed to providing reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities in our job application process.\xa0Should you require accommodation, please email', 'PagerDuty offers:', "PagerDuty is for people. Meaning, we extend opportunities to a broad array of candidates, including those with diverse workplace experiences and backgrounds. Whether you're new to the corporate world, returning to work after a gap in employment, or simply looking to transition or take the next step in your career path, we are excited to connect with you.", '- Competitive salaries and company equity']

['Prof. Nosang V. Myung’s team of the University of Notre Dame (www.myung-lab.com) is seeking a postdoctoral fellows to contribute to multiple extramurally funded work on intelligent #electrochemical #sensor system for smart agriculture, precision health, and environmental monitoring. Candidates should have a PhD from related engineering disciplines, chemistry, materials science, or other quantitative disciplines. These projects involve nanoengineered materials synthesis and characterization, sensor fabrication and testing, electronics prototyping, mobile app development for smart devices, data analysis and programming (e.g., MATLAB). Experience with at least one of these topics/techniques is required; experience with several of these topics/techniques is preferred. Good communication and interpersonal skills and successful experience contributing to translational and/or transdisciplinary teams as a “team player” are highly desirable. Please feel free to visit our website and e-mail your CV and cover letter to Prof. Nosang V. Myung (nmyung@nd.edu).']

job_text: ['Provide data profiling and work along with the senior data engineer (and other team members/architects) to correctly model and follow approved standards Unit test new code and add to our automated regression test library. ', 'Zip Code:', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Work Authorization:', 'Minimum years of IT industry experience: 10 years ', 'Please send your resume in word format, following details to anand.yalla@infolob.com , or call me @ 972-845-7069', 'Expected Billing Rate:', 'Description:', 'Develop SQL, stored procedures and ETL to enhance the current database structures to use the new platform sources based on prioritized sprint stories. ', 'LinkedIn Profile:', '\xa0', 'This position will be responsible for solutions leveraging our current SQL-Server particularly for a transformation project as we move from one servicing platform to another. ', 'Bachelor’s degree or equivalent degree in Business- CIS, Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related discipline', 'Contact Details:', 'Name in Full:', '*** Need Local Resource ***', 'Skype ID:', '8+ \xa0years writing SQL in a SQL-Server environment ', 'Position: Senior Data Engineer (ETL, SQL Database, Stored Procedures)', 'Location: Coppell, TX ', 'Take direction from a Sr. Data Engineer. ', 'Email ID:', 'Availability:', 'Job Description: POSITION SUMMARY', 'Current Location:', 'Employer Details if Any:', 'Provide unit testing and support QA and UAT testing Support downstream impacted teams in their development/testing as needed. ', 'Relocation:', 'The Data Solutions Engineer will work face-to-face with business stakeholders, and other team and IT members to create data solutions, build data models, write stored procedures, other ETL for moving data between platforms and implement data quality and other data governance processes. ', 'Experience with SQL-Server database and ETL concepts. ', 'Rate: $Open/Hour ', 'REQUIREMENTS', 'Duration: 6 Months']

job_title: Associate Scientist/Scientist, Health Care Analytical - Lab Computing and Measurement Science
job_text: ['', 'A strong record of innovation working with R&D partners and lab personnel to understand key needs and providing/implementing solutions to complex problems; capable of providing digital innovation/measurement science leadership for the team and designing/implementing an action plan to deliver robust solutions.', 'About Us', 'Effective oral/written communication skills are needed, including the ability to document/share critical insights/observations/results, provide clear/concise technical updates/presentations to those not familiar with the technologies that Analytical uses and the ability to pull together deployment, training, and communication plans related to digital innovation programs. This role requires the individual to operate with a high level of attention to detail and technical rigor across Health Care Analytical. The individual should have the ability to work on multiple projects/deliverables at any given time and be able to adapt to changing priorities while consistently delivering against commitments with excellence. Experience in cGMPs and test method validation/stability requirements for FDA regulated products is a plus but not required.', 'Mastery in both digital innovation and analytical chemistry. Technical curiosity and a desire to continually learn and develop mastery across digital innovation and analytical methods/techniques is required.Proven track record of cross functional collaboration is a must. Excellent record keeping and note-booking skills are also required.A history of driving projects to success through proactive leadership. The candidate should be comfortable with taking ownership/initiative and independence, leading by example, operating with discipline and working with a sense of urgency.A strong commitment to genuine learning and good science is necessary. This role requires the individual to operate with a high level of attention to detail and technical rigor across Health Care Analytical. The individual should have the ability to work on multiple projects/deliverables at any given time and be able to adapt to changing priorities while consistently delivering against commitments with excellence. Experience in cGMPs and test method validation/stability requirements for FDA regulated products is a plus but not required.Mastery in lab computing as related to analytical chemistry; working knowledge of analytical chemistry; flexibility; leadership; project management; collaboration/ communication skills; a focus on results; a sense of urgency; and strong critical thinking. Some experience in coding, system design, working with outside digital innovation providers, and optimizing systems are valuable, along with knowledge of systems validation. Strong technical laboratory skills, attention to detail and technical curiosity are all highly desired.', 'Mastery in both digital innovation and analytical chemistry. Technical curiosity and a desire to continually learn and develop mastery across digital innovation and analytical methods/techniques is required.', 'Skills you can expect to learn/build in this job:', 'Proven track record of cross functional collaboration is a must. Strong technical laboratory skills, attention to detail and technical curiosity are all highly desired.', 'Description', 'Whatweoffer', 'Qualifications']

['Job Description: ', 'Job Description: Client seeks a talented and enthusiastic data scientist to build scientific data products that will be used in the Research and Early Development organization to transform how we make and share decisions on data as we strive for patient benefit.This role will work closely with computational and wet lab scientists to integrate relevant data and build dashboards that will enable drug discovery teams in their work. It will also involve understanding and identifying cases where data generated across the drug discovery process can be made more useful to help teams answer key questions on drug discovery projects.Example Roles and responsibilities• Create data visualizations for biologists and chemists to understand and make decisions on experimental data• Gather user requirements for new tools to capture and share research results• Enable scientists to make their data FAIR (Findable, Accessible, Interoperable Re-usable)• Identify relevant scientific data and integrate it into a knowledge graph.• Help grow the Client R communityExperience and Education:• Master’s degree or PhD in a relevant discipline with ideally 3 or more years industry experience• Expertise with R, preferably in a production environment with significant experience Shiny development.• Experience building data products in the scientific domain, including life cycle management and improving user experience based on feedback• Excellent project management and communication skills', 'Example Roles and responsibilities', 'Experience and Education:']

['', '\xa0', "Experience conducting research in a highly technical space (e.g., data warehousing, data integration, modeling) desirable but isn't a must", 'If no prior experience in conducting research in a highly technical space, must have demonstrated ability to quickly ramp up on a technical domain/user base', 'Additional clarifications:', 'Ability to quickly and effectively analyze research data and present rich findings simply and clearly to influence product design and direction', 'This person will be working in a new feature area of Power BI. The initial set of research will be around clarifying the target users, mapping out user flows/journeys, validating the concept + designs, and driving insights that will facilitate the MVP (minimum viable product) of this feature area.', 'What I’m mostly looking for is somebody who is familiar with various research methods, capable of independently determining what research is needed in this technical area, executing on the research, delivering/communicating insights, and driving recommendations into the product.This person will be working in a new feature area of Power BI. The initial set of research will be around clarifying the target users, mapping out user flows/journeys, validating the concept + designs, and driving insights that will facilitate the MVP (minimum viable product) of this feature area.', 'What I’m mostly looking for is somebody who is familiar with various research methods, capable of independently determining what research is needed in this technical area, executing on the research, delivering/communicating insights, and driving recommendations into the product.', '\xa0A minimum of MA/MS in Experimental Psychology, Cognitive Psychology, Human Factors, Human-Computer Interaction or a related field, OR significant industry experience', '5-8 years of experience conducting product design research with demonstrated experience with a wide variety of design research methodologies including, but not limited to: usability studies, field studies (remote under Covid), in-depth interviews, heuristic evaluations, concept validation, user journey maps, competitive reviews, and surveys', "\xa0A minimum of MA/MS in Experimental Psychology, Cognitive Psychology, Human Factors, Human-Computer Interaction or a related field, OR significant industry experience5-8 years of experience conducting product design research with demonstrated experience with a wide variety of design research methodologies including, but not limited to: usability studies, field studies (remote under Covid), in-depth interviews, heuristic evaluations, concept validation, user journey maps, competitive reviews, and surveysAbility to quickly and effectively analyze research data and present rich findings simply and clearly to influence product design and directionExperience conducting research in a highly technical space (e.g., data warehousing, data integration, modeling) desirable but isn't a mustIf no prior experience in conducting research in a highly technical space, must have demonstrated ability to quickly ramp up on a technical domain/user base"]

['', '7 years minimum professional experience in geochemical experimentation, analysis, and characterization;', 'What You Will Do', 'Presentation of research results at national and international conferences.', 'Demonstrated ability to safely conduct and perform individual and collaborative research and effectively interact with a broad/diverse range of colleagues; ', 'The posting shall remain open until the position is filled, however for full consideration, please apply by close of business on March 31, 2020.', ' Conduct research into watershed and contaminant plume biogeochemical function through laboratory characterization and experimentation principally focused on field derived samples; Develop conceptual biogeochemical models for watershed and contaminant plume function and elucidate these through designing and conducting laboratory experiments, as well as geochemical analyses; Where appropriate, engage in geochemical sampling at various field sites under study at Berkeley Lab; Manage the Aqueous Geochemistry Analytical Recharge facility at Berkeley Lab, including the maintenance and use of analytical equipment such as ICP-MS, TIC/TOC, and ion chromatography, sample preparation (e.g. microwave digestion), and the promotion of a safe laboratory environment.  Interaction with a team of biogeochemists, microbiologists, hydrologists, and geophysicists to produce synergistic research that improves the understanding of research topics of interest to the U.S. Department of Energy. Timely publication of research results in peer-reviewed journals. Presentation of research results at national and international conferences. ', ' Ph.D., or equivalent work experience, in geochemistry or chemical engineering;  7 years minimum professional experience in geochemical experimentation, analysis, and characterization; Deep knowledge of biogeochemistry of both natural and contaminated aqueous, soil, and rock systems required; State of science knowledge of analytical and characterization methods for aqueous biogeochemistry required; Demonstrated ability to work independently and prepare research data; Demonstrated ability to safely conduct and perform individual and collaborative research and effectively interact with a broad/diverse range of colleagues;  Effective problem-solving, decision-making, organizational and analytical skills;  Strong written and oral communication skills. ', 'Notes', ' This is a full-time career appointment, exempt (monthly paid) from overtime pay. This position may be subject to a background check. Any convictions will be evaluated to determine if they directly relate to the responsibilities and requirements of the position. Having a conviction history will not automatically disqualify an applicant from being considered for employment. Work will be primarily performed at Lawrence Berkeley National Lab, 1 Cyclotron Road, Berkeley, CA. ', 'Ph.D., or equivalent work experience, in geochemistry or chemical engineering; ', 'Work will be primarily performed at Lawrence Berkeley National Lab, 1 Cyclotron Road, Berkeley, CA.', 'Manage the Aqueous Geochemistry Analytical Recharge facility at Berkeley Lab, including the maintenance and use of analytical equipment such as ICP-MS, TIC/TOC, and ion chromatography, sample preparation (e.g. microwave digestion), and the promotion of a safe laboratory environment.', 'State of science knowledge of analytical and characterization methods for aqueous biogeochemistry required;', 'This position may be subject to a background check. ['', 'Responsibilities:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Testing programmed screeners', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Development and execution of formal qual training programs', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in consumer research', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Produce video highlight reels and other innovative reporting deliverables', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Presenting results to clients', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaboration with clients across all phases of research studies', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Knowledge and hands on experience running qualitative projects including:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Selecting the most appropriate research methodology and techniques', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Schedule and run weekly/monthly virtual client meetings', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Proven ability to provide flawless deliverables', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Moderating remote sessions, groups, and discussions', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Review and onboarding of new qualitative tools, platforms, and partners', 'We work well together and enjoy what we do. We are looking for a team member who thrives in a creative, high-energy, fast-paced environment who can work independently and is highly productive with a commitment to the highest quality and ethical standards: someone who “gets” consumer research in today’s new media world and is driven to be the best they can with the desire to grow professionally.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with online and mobile qualitative research tools', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Manage multiple high-level client accounts and corresponding projects', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Onboarding and management of international partners/vendors', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelors or advanced degree', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Coordinating participant recruitment with the qual fieldwork team', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in quantitative research a plus', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ensuring perfection in data quality and deliverables', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience conducting UX research studies in-person and remotely a plus', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Formal moderation training/experience (e.g. RIVA)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Execution and management all phases of a research initiative—from design through report delivery', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Passionate about research and analysis', 'Position Summary:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in Youth & Family, Media & Entertainment and Technology industries a plus', 'Qualitative Researcher', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Developing activity guides', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Determining research participant qualifying criteria', 'Exciting opportunity to join a fast growing, dynamic and innovative marketing research firm. You will be joining the leader in new research technologies and innovative approaches to gaining consumer insights where every team member is considered a valued and integral component to our success. We have special expertise in digital research, the media & entertainment industry, youth and families (kids, Gen-Z, Millennials, Parents), and technology industries.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Developing and managing project schedules and budgets ensuring that all phases of a project are accomplished on schedule and on/under budget', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Practical experience with a wide array of qualitative research methodologies', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Producing topline and executive summary reports', 'We are in a rapid growth phase; become part of this exciting company and grow with us!', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Exceptional written, oral, and presentation communication abilities', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Communicating with clients to understand and document the research objectives', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Integrating secondary data sources when applicable', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Exceptional hands-on day-to-day project management skills', 'Innovation and Excellence', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Managing, mentoring, and training of project directors and associates', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Developing new methodologies to meet client project requirements as needed', 'Requirements:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Programming activities on online qual platforms (insight communities, discussion boards, diary/ethnography studies, UX studies)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A minimum of 5 years within the custom Market Research industry (supplier side)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent organizational skills with a strong focus upon managing details', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Writing qualitative screeners', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Supervising all personnel on projects', 'The Qualitative Researcher is responsible for the execution and management of all phases of a research initiative from design through report delivery and ensuring the successful execution of the research.\xa0The Qualitative Researcher takes the principal responsibility for the project running smoothly and liaising with clients and TSR management. The Qualitative Research has primary responsibility for meeting time and cost constraints, ensuring quality, providing deliverables to client satisfaction and objectives for projects assigned. Prepares the final report and deliverables or works closely with project directors and associates to ensure that report is produced per specifications and client objectives. Presents findings to client or in collaboration with the research team. Involved in proposal generation and account management. A key responsibility of the Qualitative Research is client relations and business development--expanding existing business and cultivating new business—and ensuring that our standards of excellence are always reflected in our work. The Qualitative Researcher is responsible for managing, mentoring, and training of project directors and associates in research methodology, analysis and project management. A key role is to innovate and help develop new methodologies and leverage new tools, in collaboration with the executive team, in pursuit of our mission: Innovation and Excellence.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Setting up remote IDI’s, focus groups and UX sessions', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Writing research proposals and preparing cost estimates']

job_text: ['', ' Work as a key part of a team to advance multiple therapeutic target projects. ', ' Professional experience in assay development, drug discovery, genetic engineering, and/or in vivo target validation desired but not required. ', ' Candidate should be an innovative and analytical thinker with strong interpersonal and communication skills. ', ' EEO is The Law - click here for more information ', ' M.S. degree with 2+ years research experience or B.S. degree with a minimum of 5 years in a relevant industry setting. ', 'CHARACTERISTIC DUTIES', ' Manage internal collaborations with genetic perturbation (i.e. genetic modifier screens, drugging to resistance, biochemical assay development) and proteomics groups (mass spec-based Target ID), and external CROs. ', ' Equal Opportunity Employer Minorities/Women/Protected Veterans/Disabled ', ' Ph.D. degree in molecular biology, cellular biology, cancer biology or related discipline with 0-3 years of postdoctoral training. ', ' All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or protected veteran status. ', ' Refine and execute an established portfolio of cellular assays using genetic (CRISPR, RNAi) and chemical perturbation tools for pre-clinical validation of targets and compounds. ', 'Check out this video for a look into our community!', 'Job Description', ' Use our highly collaborative team of academic scientists and platforms across the Institute to consult, deploy, and execute on novel assays. ', ' Check out this video for a look into our community!', ' A successful candidate will be highly self-motivated and enthusiastic about taking a hands-on approach to collaborative scientific discovery efforts. ', ' Critically evaluate and interpret results and scientific merit of various experimental approaches. ', ' Work as a key part of a team to advance multiple therapeutic target projects.  Critically evaluate and interpret results and scientific merit of various experimental approaches.  Refine and execute an established portfolio of cellular assays using genetic (CRISPR, RNAi) and chemical perturbation tools for pre-clinical validation of targets and compounds.  Manage internal collaborations with genetic perturbation (i.e. genetic modifier screens, drugging to resistance, biochemical assay development) and proteomics groups (mass spec-based Target ID), and external CROs.  Use our highly collaborative team of academic scientists and platforms across the Institute to consult, deploy, and execute on novel assays.  Create, monitor, and implement effective scientific plans on clear timelines; monitor project progress, participate in setting project scope and recommending new research directions.  Supervises junior team members in the execution of project goals ', 'REQUIREMENTS', ' Create, monitor, and implement effective scientific plans on clear timelines; monitor project progress, participate in setting project scope and recommending new research directions. ', ' Candidate should have an outstanding academic and professional track record ', ' Ph.D. degree in molecular biology, cellular biology, cancer biology or related discipline with 0-3 years of postdoctoral training.  M.S. degree with 2+ years research experience or B.S. degree with a minimum of 5 years in a relevant industry setting.  Professional experience in assay development, drug discovery, genetic engineering, and/or in vivo target validation desired but not required.  Candidate should have an outstanding academic and professional track record  Candidate should be an innovative and analytical thinker with strong interpersonal and communication skills.  A successful candidate will be highly self-motivated and enthusiastic about taking a hands-on approach to collaborative scientific discovery efforts. ', ' Supervises junior team members in the execution of project goals ']

['', 'Conduct and evaluate quantitative and qualitative research for a highly technical IT Operations system administrator user', 'Create and share templates, trainings and best practices', 'Excellent communication skills, both written and spoken', 'Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written and oral presentations', 'WHAT YOU WILL DO', 'Ability to partner with head of UX, Product and Engineering to get buy in and funding and attention to high impact studies that directly impact the product and company’s focus and de-risk the direction of initiatives', 'Plan and implement user research strategies and methodologies', 'BONUS', 'Ability to consolidate disparate insight from analytics, customer support, product managers and more to gather insight and share findings and trends', 'Mentor and coach junior UX Researchers and Product Managers', 'Ability to formulate specific, answerable, and practical questions', 'Automox aims to be an employer of choice and we know that means offering a comprehensive compensation package to support our employees. Our packages include base salary, bonus, equity, and benefits for all full time permanent employees.', 'Perks: Monthly internet and wellness stipend, money to set up your home office, and no commute.', 'SALARY', 'Support A/B testing experiments', 'Ability to transcribe and manage large amounts of qualitative input\xa0', 'BENEFITS:\xa0Healthcare options through Cigna and Guardian including Medical, Dental, Vision, Basic Life insurance, Voluntary Life Insurance, Basic STD & LTD, HSA, FSA, 401(k) and more. Automox has a generous employer contribution towards all health plans with low premiums for all employees.\xa0\xa0Parental Benefits: Adoption benefits, Parental leaveTime off: We have a flexible PTO policy with an additional 9 paid holidays.', 'Ability to work with multiple priorities', 'OVERVIEW', 'WHY AUTOMOX\xa0\xa0We are on a mission to enable every IT Admin to automate the fundamental tasks that keep their corporation secure. This mission can only be accomplished with a culture embodies entrepreneurialism, accountability and providing our employees with the clear direction and freedom to do their best work. We don’t measure excellence based on how but on the what. Each employee has a value and contribution to the success of Automox. We look forward to working with you and seeing the success you will bring on our journey.\xa0\xa0', 'Help validate and understand accessibility and usability changes required to the application', 'Focus on employee experience and engaging the empathy of the organization around the user’s primary goals and needs', 'Perks', "SALARY: Our salary ranges are based on national averages and are determined based on the level of the position we are hiring for. The ranges are wide to leave room for variability in a candidate's skills, experience, and location all which impact where someone might come in on the range.\xa0$125,000 - $170,000", 'BENEFITS', 'Experience with remote testing tools', 'Ability to quickly and effectively share research results', 'EQUITY: We’re all in this together and everyone should have a stake in the company which is why all employees receive stock options.\xa0', "Bachelor or Master's in a human behavior related field (or equivalent and demonstrable work experience)", 'Proven teamwork skills', 'REQUIRED SKILLS', 'EQUITY', 'LOCATION', 'WHY AUTOMOX', 'Remote : Anywhere in the US. The world is changing so are we. Automox has moved to a fully distributed company and is open to hiring across the US.\xa0', 'Ability to actively listen to others', 'TOTAL COMPENSATION', 'You are an experienced user researcher who focuses on insight in an agile and rapidly changing environment. You love conducting studies for rapid iterations rather than extensive process and bring a perfect blend of UX strategy with lean methodologies (Ah, the irony). You will be a leader in gathering and sharing user insight from experiments through user behavior, support feedback, product feedback and user research activities. These responsibilities also include inspiring change, delivering oral and written presentations, and helping the UX team and product organization better understand what would make a user’s experience more simple, loveable, accessible, and seamless.', 'Use a diverse set of UX research tools', 'Ask questions, gather data, and analyze data', 'Founded in 2015,\xa0Automox is coming off its fourth quarter of record growth that has seen its platform become the most recommended solution in endpoint security and the preferred endpoint management solution for over 1,500 customers across 30 countries.\xa0With an increasing number of operating systems, servers, hardware, and applications that need to be maintained, updated, configured, and patched on a regular basis, IT ops teams are feeling fatigued and vulnerable. Automox is building a company and team to tackle this problem for millions of endpoints.', 'Five or more years of UX research experience', 'BONUS: All employees are part of our Company bonus plan. Our bonus is a mix of company performance and individual contributions.', "Five or more years of UX research experienceBachelor or Master's in a human behavior related field (or equivalent and ['', 'Owning user research for a portfolio of products (we call “a pod”).', 'Act with integrity\xa0', 'This role could be a fit for you if you bring:', 'Experience in accessibility testing and evaluation such as VPAT audits.', '6+ years of professional experience in UX research; 3+ years of experience working in the B2B / SaaS space.\xa0Expertise in both generative and evaluative user research using qualitative and quantitative methods (e.g., one-on-one and focus group interviews, diary studies, user testing, online survey).\xa0\xa0Demonstrated ability to shape and inform product strategy and product design through user research.Demonstrated ability to identify new product opportunities by connecting people problems, analytics, and organizational goals.Experience with design thinking and the human-centered design approach.Excellent time management and able to handle multiple projects at a time.', "As a\xa0Sr. UX Researcher\xa0on Nuvolo's Innovation Team, you will be an experienced UX Researcher who is empathetic, curious, collaborative, flexible, and able think strategically. We are a fast-growing and close-knit team, including UX Designers, Researchers, and Strategists with diverse backgrounds. UX research excellence is key to Nuvolo’s success as a leading SaaS and IWMS provider. In this role, you’ll have the executive support to embed user research and user insights in product design so you can focus on flexing your research muscles.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0", 'Expertise in both generative and evaluative user research using qualitative and quantitative methods (e.g., one-on-one and focus group interviews, diary studies, user testing, online survey).\xa0\xa0', 'Experience in product analytics using tools such as Pendo.', 'As a Sr. UX Researcher your role will include:', 'Experience with design thinking and the human-centered design approach.', 'Facilitating workshops to gather diverse perspectives and to gain alignment in key research phases (e.g., synthesizing research data to identify opportunities).', 'Experience in accessibility testing and evaluation such as VPAT audits.Experience in product analytics using tools such as Pendo.', 'Mentoring and coaching other team members on the research methods and best practices.', 'Nuvolo is the global leader in modern, cloud-based Connected Workplace solutions.? Built on Service Now.', '\xa0', 'Planning the research roadmap for your pod while collaborating with the other researchers to seek synergy across pods.', 'Demonstrated ability to identify new product opportunities by connecting people problems, analytics, and organizational goals.', 'Sr. UX Researcher', 'Excellent time management and able to handle multiple projects at a time.', 'Occasionally traveling to client and/or office locations when travel is safe.\xa0Owning user research for a portfolio of products (we call “a pod”).Leading a cross-functional team in your pod (including UX, product, engineering, and QA) to gain a deep understanding of our clients and their respective vertical industries.Working with Product Managers, UX designers, and leadership to identify research opportunities, then delivering high-quality and timely research insights to shape the product strategy and product design.Facilitating workshops to gather diverse perspectives and to gain alignment in key research phases (e.g., synthesizing research data to identify opportunities).Planning the research roadmap for your pod while collaborating with the other researchers to seek synergy across pods.Mentoring and coaching other team members on the research methods and best practices.', 'The culture offers a friendly environment where you are challenged and can achieve more!\xa0', 'Occasionally traveling to client and/or office locations when travel is safe.\xa0', 'Leading a cross-functional team in your pod (including UX, product, engineering, and QA) to gain a deep understanding of our clients and their respective vertical industries.', 'Who are we?\xa0', 'We provide a single platform to manage all people, all physical locations, all assets, and all work – enabling data sharing across departments. Industries we serve through our SaaS applications include healthcare, life sciences, financial services, retail, government, higher education & enterprise.\xa0We are a software company that\xa0provides generous compensation, excellent benefits, stock options plan, and the opportunity\xa0to be\xa0surrounded by passionate team members that look out for each other. ', 'Bonus points for:', 'Act with integrity\xa0Embrace teamwork\xa0Take care of each other\xa0', 'Take care of each other\xa0', '6+ years of professional experience in UX research; 3+ years of experience working in the B2B / SaaS space.\xa0', 'Nuvolo\xa0is\xa0proud to be\xa0an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.\xa0', 'You\xa0could\xa0be a fit for\xa0Nuvolo if you\xa0champion\xa0our core values:\xa0', 'Demonstrated ability to shape and inform product strategy and product design through user research.', 'Embrace teamwork\xa0', 'Working with Product Managers, UX designers, and leadership to identify research opportunities, then delivering high-quality and timely research insights to shape the product strategy and product design.']

['', 'Candidate should be comfortable working independently and/or part of a project team', 'Provide consultations to senior management on research strategies and plans in the transportation fuel area', 'Education and Experience', 'Must possess good work habits, a strong work ethic, and be able to adhere to company work hours, policies, and standard business etiquette', 'Participate in various transportation strategic studies aimed at understanding the interplay between future vehicle, engine, and fuel technologies and global energy demand / supply landscape', 'Applicant is a recognized expert in the transportation data analyses field and will initiate and lead research projects related studies of emerging transportation technologies and show strong capability in data visualization techniques. Ability to focus research on quantifying the energy market dynamics and risk through stochastic modelling and optimization, technological innovation and diffusion in the energy market and auto industry. Additionally, should be able to quantitatively address the policy implications of energy supply and use from their macro-economic, social and environmental aspects.', 'Duties & Responsibilities', '\xa0', 'Perform other duties as assigned', 'Understanding of vehicle powertrain, engine, and fuel technology development trends', 'Knowledge in alternative fuel vehicle technologies, such as BEV, FCV, etc.', 'B.S. ['', 'Responsibilities:', "Corel products enable millions of connected knowledge workers around the world to do great work faster. Offering some of the industry's best-known software brands, we give individuals and teams the power to create, collaborate, and deliver impressive results. Our success is driven by an unwavering commitment to deliver a broad portfolio of innovative applications – including CorelDRAW®, MindManager®, Parallels®, and WinZip® – to inspire users and help them achieve their goals.", 'Build data models, ETLs and data wrangling workflows for various projects.', 'Perform exploratory data analysis on various data sets available within the corporation. Eventually be the expert on key data sets within Corel.', 'Corel is all about breaking convention to achieve exceptional things. We’re the people behind the world’s leading software and we’re obsessed with finding new ways to harness the creativity of our customers and our employees. We’re a talented, eclectic, and eccentric group that makes coming to work every day worth your while. This is not your typical tech team. We also have a healthy respect for work-life balance – so you can leave work at work.', 'The mission of the Corel Analytics team is to leverage data to find insights that empower the Executive Leadership Team to make smart decisions and to optimize eCommerce and Channel sales operations across the 25+ brands under Corel Corporation. ', 'Qualifications:', 'Bachelors or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineer, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or in an similar quantitative field is preferred. ', 'Self-starter with a can-do attitude and a strong sense of ownership.', 'Optimize and maintain our distributed data infrastructure that includes warehouses like Google Big Query, AWS Redshift and SQL Servers.', 'Fast learner and ability to work effectively in teams.', 'Perform root cause analysis of data issues. Address inevitable disruptions in data ingestion pipelines and in data transformation processes.', '8+ years of expert-level working experience in SQL or Python for advanced data wrangling and analysis.', 'Continue to adapt to changes based on emergence of new technologies, new competitors, AI and alternative sources of data.', 'Process oriented.', 'Curious to learn new things and passionate about technology.', 'Assist in building a comprehensive data catalog and implement data governance strategies, as required by the business.', 'Design and build a Customer Data Platform (CDP) solution for Corel. ', 'About Corel', 'Strong technical skills in best of class technologies around data warehousing, data wrangling, data quality and data governance.', 'Working knowledge of agile development process.', 'Keys to success in the role:', '8+ years of expert-level working experience in SQL or Python for advanced data wrangling and analysis.5+ years of experience in developing automated data pipelines and data workflows in one or more cloud Big Data Platforms like Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud Platform or Azure Cloud Computing Services.Proficient in at least one programming language like Python, Bash or Java.Experience building automated data quality tracking processes or tools is preferred.Working knowledge of agile development process.Bachelors or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineer, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or in an similar quantitative field is preferred. ', 'Build data quality tracking and alerting mechanisms to proactively identify and address data anomalies before they impact the business.', 'It is the policy and practice of the Company to offer equal employment opportunities to all qualified applicants and employees without regard to race, color, age, religion, national origin, sex, political affiliation, sexual orientation, marital status, disability, veteran status, genetics, or any other protected characteristic.\xa0', 'Setup reliable data ingestion pipelines to the different warehouses and to reporting tools like Tableau and Google Data Studio.', 'Experience building automated data quality tracking processes or tools is preferred.', 'Superb analytical skills, technical aptitude and attention to detail', 'Flexible and ability to embrace change effectively.', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills', '5+ years of experience in developing automated data pipelines and data workflows in one or more cloud Big Data Platforms like Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud Platform or Azure Cloud Computing Services.', 'Proficient in at least one programming language like Python, Bash or Java.', 'Design and build a Customer Data Platform (CDP) solution for Corel. company: Northwestern University - The Feinberg School of Medicine
job_text: ['', 'Northwestern University is an Equal Opportunity, Affirmative Action Employer of all protected classes, including veterans and individuals with disabilities. Women, underrepresented racial and ethnic minorities, individuals with disabilities, and veterans are encouraged to apply. Hiring is contingent upon eligibility to work in the United States.', 'The Dr. Chen lab at Northwestern University Feinberg School of Medicine is seeking a self-motivated postdoc fellow to join our team. Current research in our lab focuses on studying how genetic and epigenetic regulation of cancer cells and cancer stem cells can shape the immunosuppressive tumor microenvironment, and reciprocally, how these infiltrating immune cells affect tumor progression and the effectiveness of immunotherapies. For more information on research projects in the lab, please refer to following publications (Cancer Discovery 2020, 10:371-381 cover; Cancer Cell 2019, 35:868-884; PNAS 2017, 114:580-585; Cell Rep 2021, 34:108597; and Trends in Immunology, in press, cover) and our webpage:https://sites.northwestern.edu/chenlab/.', 'PNAS', 'Postdoc Position and/or Research Technician – Cancer Biology and Immunology', 'Cell Rep', 'For postdoc postion, the ideal applicants should receive a doctoral degree (PhD or MD/PhD) recently. Experience in cancer biology, tumor immunology and cancer genetics/epigenetics is preferred. Preference will be given to candidates with first-author publications in peer-reviewed journals. For research technician position, the ideal candidates should have a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree and have research experience with mouse models. Interested applicants please send your curriculum vitae, cover letter, and names and contact information of three references to Dr. Chen at peiwen.chen@northwestern.edu', 'Trends in Immunology', 'Cancer Cell', 'Cancer Discovery']

development', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0P-PSMA-ALLO1 is our allogeneic product candidate for metastatic castrate-resistant prostate cancer, currently in development with an anticipated IND filing and programs with what we believe to be transformational science. We are passionate about making an impact on the development of patient solutions with our CAR-T therapies in various cancers and gene therapies for rare diseases. Our wholly-owned portfolio of product candidates is specifically designed to overcome the limitations of current generation cell and gene therapeutics, including:', 'Gene Therapy Programs ', 'Ability to analyze data and synthesize information from various disciplines into experimental designs and execution', 'in vivo', 'Excellent organizational skills, ability to multi-task', 'Position Summary', '\xa0', 'Demonstrated ability to work effectively in a dynamic, complex, and fast-paced team environment', 'P-MMUT-101 ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0We have initiated a Phase 1 clinical trial and are currently dosing patients for our second autologous product candidate targeting PSMA, P-PSMA-101, for the treatment of patients with metastatic-castrate resistant prostate cancer.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0P-BCMA-101, is an autologous CAR-T targeting BCMA that we are currently evaluating in an expanded Phase 1 clinical trial for the treatment of patients with relapsed/refractory multiple myeloma.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0P-MUC1C-ALLO1 for multiple solid tumors is currently in pre-clinical development with an anticipated IND filing expected in late 2021', 'Develop and implement reproducible and high-quality animal models for the determination and evaluation of CAR-T, gene therapies, and other areas to meet Poseida’s portfolio', 'CAR-T Programs', 'The In Vivo Pharmacology Scientist will be responsible for the design, execution, supervision and analysis of pre-clinical pharmacology research studies in support of Poseida Therapeutic’s Immuno-Oncology and Gene Therapy portfolio. The successful applicant will be innovative and have deep knowledge of cellular and molecular immunology as well as a robust background in animal models of disease to evaluate the basic biologic components associated with CAR-T and gene therapies that will enable the identification of potential therapeutic benefits or risks. Furthermore, the candidate will be part of a collaborative team that develops, implements, and supports in vivo platforms focused on reproducible, high quality, and robust drug discovery experimental procedures.\xa0', 'Experience in working with teams in a collaborative interdisciplinary environment', 'Responsibilities\xa0', 'Mentor junior scientists and research associates', 'P-PSMA-101', 'Requirements, Knowledge, Skills and Abilities', 'PhD and postdoctoral experience or equivalent in Immunology, Pharmacology, or related disciplines with 2+ years of experience in academia or biotech industry', 'Our lead “off-the-shelf” product candidate, P-BCMA-ALLO1', 'Develop and implement reproducible and high-quality animal models for the determination and evaluation of CAR-T, gene therapies, and other areas to meet Poseida’s portfolioDevelop and execute in vivo product screening in support of product developmentWork collaboratively with research teams to identify possible toxicology effects and therapeutic strategiesMentor junior scientists and research associatesAnalyze data and troubleshoot preclinical researchPrepare study protocols, reports, and regulatory documents', 'Prepare study protocols, reports, and regulatory documents', 'DUAL CAR (BCMA/CD19)', 'Analyze data and troubleshoot preclinical research', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0P-MMUT-101 is our second gene therapy product candidate for rare liver disease, targeting Methylmalonic Acidemia.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Designed to include two or more fully functional CAR molecules into a T cell, we also have preclinical studies ongoing with DUAL CAR (CD19/CD20) in B cell malignancies and DUAL CAR (BCMA/CD19) in multiple myeloma where we anticipate filing INDs and initiating Phase 1 clinical trials in late 2021 and 2022. We also expect to initiate a trial in an undisclosed target in solid tumors in the future.', 'P-BCMA-101', 'Based in San Diego, Poseida Therapeutics is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company utilizing proprietary gene engineering platform technologies to create next generation cell and gene therapies with the capacity to cure. We are developing a broad portfolio of cell and gene product candidates in a variety of indications based on our core proprietary platforms, including our non-viral piggyBac® DNA Modification System, Cas-CLOVER™ site-specific gene editing system and nanoparticle- and AAV-based gene delivery technologies.', 'P-MUC1C-ALLO1', 'Excellent scientific capability demonstrated by scientific accomplishments such as publications, invited presentations, etc.', 'Analytical methods for functional characterization of T cells such as activation, cytotoxicity, cytokine secretion, and proliferation', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0We are currently developing P-OTC-101, a liver-directed gene utilizing our proprietary piggyBac® DNA Modification System in combination with AAV/nanoparticle technology. P-OTC-101 is development for the in vivo treatment of Ornithine Transcarbamylase deficiency, a rare disease of the liver', 'Who We Are and What We Do', 'Proficiency in culture of primary and immortalized mammalian cells']

['', 'Excellent problem-solving skills with an ability to analyze situations, identify existing or potential problems and recommend solutions.', 'Advanced degree in Social Sciences, HCI, or related field.5 plus years of hands-on experience in user-centered research and evaluation.Ability to use quantitative data (e.g. usage logs and A/B tests) to generate qualitative understanding of user needs and behaviors and vice versa.Experience with a varied set of research methods including user interview, survey, prototype testing, A/B, and ethnography.\xa0Ability to identify when an opportunity can best be understood with qualitative or quantitative data.Familiarity with common online research and survey tools such as: Optimal Workshop, Qualtrics, and Ethnio.Ability to drive all aspects of research from planning to execution and communicating insights with a multidisciplinary audience.Excellent problem-solving skills with an ability to analyze situations, identify existing or potential problems and recommend solutions.Outstanding analytical and strategic thinking skills.Ability to multitask and manage several projects simultaneously.Familiarity with academic search literature, standards, and user expectations a plus.\xa0Experience in an Agile environment is desirable.', 'Learn more about Working at ITHAKA.', '5 plus years of hands-on experience in user-centered research and evaluation.', 'Experience in an Agile environment is desirable.', 'Advanced degree in Social Sciences, HCI, or related field.', 'Partner with product teams in crafting UX experiences and relevancy results which are deeply rooted in the understanding of user needs and expectations.Craft and execute research to validate various product hypotheses, leveraging your broad toolkit of methods including: in-depth interview, survey, prototype testing, usability, observational, A/B, card sort, click test, etc.Partner with designers throughout the discovery and development process to craft elegant and innovative UI solutions.As a core member of the JSTOR Search & Discovery product teams, work daily with engineers, designers, product managers, and analysts to prioritize and execute research opportunities in a fast-paced changing environment.Foster research and discovery skill growth within the Search & Discovery product teams.\xa0Stay up-to-date on leading industry literature on search and ongoing developments in the UX research field; actively suggest solutions that leverage improvements from both areas.', 'As a core member of the JSTOR Search & Discovery product teams, work daily with engineers, designers, product managers, and analysts to prioritize and execute research opportunities in a fast-paced changing environment.', 'Outstanding analytical and strategic thinking skills.', 'Interested candidates can submit their resume, a detailed cover letter, and salary requirements.', '\xa0', 'Work for ITHAKA', 'Evidence is one of our core organizational values, and this role is crucial in enabling us to utilize data to drive decisions. The User Researcher’s role is to inform, develop, and execute a variety of search focused research activities. Working collaboratively with stakeholders and team members you will generate research findings that bring new functions, features, and products to life. As a User Researcher, you will craft research approaches and analyses that inform the search offerings of JSTOR and Artstor, platforms that make academic journals, books, documents, and images available to millions of learners around the world.\xa0', 'Experience with a varied set of research methods including user interview, survey, prototype testing, A/B, and ethnography.\xa0', 'Ability to multitask and manage several projects simultaneously.', 'Familiarity with academic search literature, standards, and user expectations a plus.\xa0', 'Responsibilities', 'Our team is passionate about our mission and supporting one another.\xa0 We enjoy working together to create opportunities for people to learn and grow out in the world, and we bring that same commitment to helping our teammates develop in our careers and our lives.\xa0 One of our core values is belonging. We embrace differences, and believe that the things that make each of us unique are the things that help us see new insights and build better solutions.\xa0', '\xa0We are committed to our organizational values of belonging, evidence, speed, teamwork, and trust.', 'JSTOR makes knowledge accessible to millions of users globally. Come help ITHAKA expand our mission and be part of a team dedicated to crafting delightful experiences and providing affordable access to academic journals, books, images, and primary sources to researchers in 170 countries.\xa0\xa0', 'Partner with designers throughout the discovery and development process to craft elegant and innovative UI solutions.', 'Ability to drive all aspects of research from planning to execution and communicating insights with a multidisciplinary audience.', 'Ability to use quantitative data (e.g. usage logs and A/B tests) to generate qualitative understanding of user needs and behaviors and vice versa.', 'The Role', 'Ability to identify when an opportunity can best be understood with qualitative or quantitative data.', 'Apply Now:', 'Familiarity with common online research and survey tools such as: Optimal Workshop, Qualtrics, and Ethnio.', 'Craft and execute research to validate various product hypotheses, leveraging your broad toolkit of methods including: in-depth interview, survey, prototype testing, usability, observational, A/B, card sort, click test, etc.', 'Mid-Senior Level', 'Ann Arbor, MI', 'As part of the User Insights team, you will partner with researchers and analysts to enhance organizational knowledge of the existing and future JSTOR user base. This team provides information that leads to deeply engaging and delightful products. This role works extensively with Product Managers, Product Designers, and Developers within Discovery teams to test and validate new and existing product concepts. The User Researcher guides teams to define research goals, choose appropriate methodologies, plan, execute, and evaluate research studies.\xa0', 'Partner with product teams in crafting UX experiences and relevancy results which are deeply rooted in the understanding of user needs and expectations.', 'Foster research and discovery skill growth within the Search & Discovery product teams.\xa0', 'We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action employer.\xa0 All qualified applicants receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, sex, national origin, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, religion, domestic violence victim status, veteran status, disability, history of disability or perceived disability, or other status protected by law.\xa0', 'ITHAKA’s products host a variety of content types, from research articles to images, covering a range of topics, including science, history, and literature. Moreover, our diverse audiences of students and faculty have diverse expectations of search. As a User Researcher, you will help us overcome these challenges by helping the search teams translate user behaviors and needs into actionable and measurable solutions.\xa0', 'Stay up-to-date on leading industry literature on search and ongoing developments in the UX research field; actively suggest solutions that leverage improvements from both areas.', 'Experience and Skills', 'User Researcher: Search & Discovery\xa0', 'Are you passionate about infusing the user’s voice to craft meaningful solutions? Do you have a research toolkit busting at the seams? Are you a collaborative researcher who loves to be part of the team generating hypotheses and tailoring research to inform innovative solutions? We are looking for an energetic self-starter to help us level up our search and discovery experiences.\xa0\xa0']

['', 'General Responsibilities:', 'Rate: up to 60/hr on W2 ONLY!!!', 'Conduct heuristic UI reviews, user interviews, and focus groups; develop information architecture wireframes; and utilizing other research sources and research methodologies, as appropriate. ', 'Help teams identify and prioritize features and usability issues to achieve optimal process efficiency, time savings, and end-user satisfaction, within project constraints and business requirements. ', 'Drive usability feedback and results to help improve the products through every stage of the product lifecycle.', 'Recommend and work with the teams to implement appropriate research plans for their projects.', ' Responsible for usability planning, coordinating and executing user research, prioritizing usability issues, and other related tasks. ', 'Term: 1 yr contract', 'Conduct applied usability work such as running remote, in-house, and on-site usability lab studies. ', 'Collaborate with various teams across the company as needed, e.g., Product Managers, Designers, Project Managers, Program Managers, and other researchers working on PSG-related projects. ', 'Position: Senior UX Researcher', 'Conduct applied usability work such as running remote, in-house, and on-site usability lab studies. Conduct heuristic UI reviews, user interviews, and focus groups; develop information architecture wireframes; and utilizing other research sources and research methodologies, as appropriate. Collaborate with various teams across the company as needed, e.g., Product Managers, Designers, Project Managers, Program Managers, and other researchers working on PSG-related projects. Help teams identify and prioritize features and usability issues to achieve optimal process efficiency, time savings, and end-user satisfaction, within project constraints and business requirements. Recommend and work with the teams to implement appropriate research plans for their projects. Responsible for usability planning, coordinating and executing user research, prioritizing usability issues, and other related tasks. Drive usability feedback and results to help improve the products through every stage of the product lifecycle.']
