If you need assistance or an accommodation due to a disability, you may contact us at job_accommodations@spin.pm.', 'Sophisticated training and knowledge in ML, Ph.D. preferred in Computer Science or related STEM subject area.', 'About Spin', 'Opportunity to join a fast-growing startup and help shape and establish the company’s industry leadership', 'Ideally, strong programming skills (Python, R or Java/Scala) in PyTorch or TensorFlow', '5+ years of hands-on experience and knowledge of classic and modern ML and data tools and techniques', '3+ years of experience leading and mentoring teams to success in deploying ML models as part of a consumer products or marketplace at scale', 'Build a brand for this high impact team to attract and retain top researchers and scientists.', 'Wellness perk for salaried roles', 'Spin is a fast-growing micromobility company committed to a world with clean air, liveable cities, safe streets, and widespread access to convenient, affordable transportation. If you’re searching for a top-tier career where you can make a difference and dynamically collaborate within a creative, lively environment—Spin welcomes you!', 'Lead and manage a team of ML researchers, statisticians, and quantitative analysts to craft and execute decision making.Set standard methodologies and processes for machine learning and data science from research, prototyping, experimentation, validation to production.Own and make a direct impact on the success of all ML models and output including disambiguation, predictions, and recommendations.Partner with cross-functional teams to define strategy and vision, and align the team effort and individuals’ goals to reach there.Build a brand for this high impact team to attract and retain top researchers and scientists.', '\xa0', 'Opportunity to join a fast-growing startup and help shape and establish the company’s industry leadershipCompetitive health benefitsUnlimited PTO for salaried rolesPre-tax commuter benefitsMonthly cell phone bill stipendWellness perk for salaried roles', 'Partner with cross-functional teams to define strategy and vision, and align the team effort and individuals’ goals to reach there.', 'Responsibilities', 'Set standard methodologies and processes for machine learning and data science from research, prototyping, experimentation, validation to production.', 'Founded in 2017, and now a subsidiary of Ford Motor Company, we have worked together with cities, campuses, community groups, and businesses to expand internationally. Even as we expand, we maintain the close feeling of a small business, with “fireside chats” chats led by our company’s founders, weekly OKR pop-up videos, music-infused presentations at our All Hands meetings, and more. During this time of working remotely, our creativity and shared goals have kept us united and bonded within our virtual community.', 'Monthly cell phone bill stipend', 'Qualifications', 'Unlimited PTO for salaried roles', 'About the Role', "Spin is an equal opportunity employer and will not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment in an unlawful matter. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all individuals. Spin treats all employees and job applicants on the basis of merit, qualifications, and competence without regard to any qualified individuals' sex, race, color, religion, national origin, ancestry, gender (including pregnancy, breastfeeding, or related medical condition), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, physical or mental disability, medical condition, genetic characteristic or information, marital status, military and veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by state or federal law. Spin also considers qualified applicants with criminal histories, consistent with applicable local, state, and federal law.", 'While hiring and building out our world-class Data Science team, you will build machine learning models that will improve operational efficiency via modeling and forecasting of geospatial scooter demand and rental dynamics. Working with the rest of the data team to build User Segments, LTV, and User Churn models which will generate user growth, automate, and drive investment in user acquisition. As one of our first Data Scientist Managers, you will be hands-on working with advanced inference and forecasting models for Spin’s scooter marketplace dynamics. You will team up with our current data team and build fraud, payment, and risk models; building these models using data from IoT devices to detect non-compliant user behavior - Scooter placement, locking, sidewalk detection, etc. For user experience, apply ML models to power personalization and recommendations features.', 'Lead and manage a team of ML researchers, statisticians, and quantitative analysts to craft and execute decision making.', 'Competitive health benefits', 'We are a diverse team of artists, engineers, designers, urban planners, policymakers, marketers, and operators. We believe in inclusivity and build powerful alliances to fulfill our goals and move our mission forward. Above all, we at Spin are connected by our values and #BeOrange spirit, which represents unity, purpose, passion, and creativity.', "We’re passionate about transportation and technology. The work we accomplish fulfills a sense of meaning and purpose, which goes beyond the traditional dimensions of a workplace. Our products and initiatives directly influence people’s lives, which is proven by our customers' feedback.", 'Benefits & Perks', 'Own and make a direct impact on the success of all ML models and output including disambiguation, predictions, and recommendations.', 'Pre-tax commuter benefits', 'Sophisticated training and knowledge in ML, Ph.D. preferred in Computer Science or related STEM subject area.3+ years of experience leading and mentoring teams to success in deploying ML models as part of a consumer products or marketplace at scale5+ years of hands-on experience and knowledge of classic and modern ML and data tools and techniquesIdeally, strong programming skills (Python, R or Java/Scala) in PyTorch or TensorFlow']

['', 'Practical hands-on programming and engineering experience in R, Python, Java, and Scala. Strong R experience is required.', '6+ years of deep experience with large scale distributed big data systems, pipelines, and data processing.', 'Key Qualifications:', 'As part of a small team, you will own significant responsibility in crafting, developing, and maintaining our large-scale ETL pipelines, storage, and processing services. The team is looking for a self-driven data engineer to help design and build data pipelines that allow our team to develop the high quality, scalable data assets. In addition to the design and implementation of this infrastructure, you will be responsible for communicating with data scientists and other team members to determine the most effective models to improve data access, promote econometrics research, and eventually ship groundbreaking features to our customers.', "BS or MS in Computer Science, Engineering or equivalent. Master's degree preferred.", 'Summary:', 'Compensation – Position offers a very competitive compensation package consisting of a base salary, bonus and equity as well as a benefits package.', 'Description:', 'Principal Data Engineer', 'Passion for building trustworthy, reliable, stable, and fast data products that serve customer needs.', 'Experience in in Financial Service sectors such as Banking, Insurance or Wealth Management is a plus.', 'Education & Experience: ', 'Software engineering experience and discipline in design, test, source code management and CI/CD practices.', '\xa0', 'Experience in stream data processing and real time analytics of data generated from user interaction with applications is a plus.', 'If interested and qualified, please send a cover letter with your resume to employment@powerlytics.com', '6+ years of deep experience with large scale distributed big data systems, pipelines, and data processing.Practical hands-on programming and engineering experience in R, Python, Java, and Scala. Strong R experience is required.Proven experience using distributed computer frameworks on Hadoop, Spark, Cassandra, Kafka, AirFlow, distributed SQL, and NoSQL query engines.Able to setup large scale data pipeline and data monitoring system to make sure overall pipeline is healthy.Willing to take ownership of pipeline and can communicate concisely and persuasively to a varied audience including data provider, engineering, and analysts.Ability to identify, prioritize, and answer the most critical areas where analytics and modeling will have a material impact.Experience in stream data processing and real time analytics of data generated from user interaction with applications is a plus.Prior experience with modern web services architectures, cloud platforms, preferably AWS and Databricks.Understanding of design and development of large scale, high throughput and low latency applications is a plus.Aptitude to independently learn new technologies.Excellent verbal and written communication skills is required.', 'Aptitude to independently learn new technologies.', 'Proven experience using distributed computer frameworks on Hadoop, Spark, Cassandra, Kafka, AirFlow, distributed SQL, and NoSQL query engines.', 'Compensation – ', 'Deep understanding of key algorithms and tools for developing high efficiency data processing systems.', 'Location: Remote (should be able to work in EST time zone with occasional Post COVID travel to company headquarters in Philadelphia, PA area)', 'Ability to identify, prioritize, and answer the most critical areas where analytics and modeling will have a material impact.', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills is required.', 'Sponsorship: This role does not offer visa sponsorship', 'Understanding of design and development of large scale, high throughput and low latency applications is a plus.', 'Passion for building trustworthy, reliable, stable, and fast data products that serve customer needs.Software engineering experience and discipline in design, test, source code management and CI/CD practices.Experience in data modeling and developing SQL database solutions.Deep understanding of key algorithms and tools for developing high efficiency data processing systems.Experience in in Financial Service sectors such as Banking, Insurance or Wealth Management is a plus.', 'Prior experience with modern web services architectures, cloud platforms, preferably AWS and Databricks.', 'Willing to take ownership of pipeline and can communicate concisely and persuasively to a varied audience including data provider, engineering, and analysts.', 'Additional Requirements:', 'Experience in data modeling and developing SQL database solutions.', 'Able to setup large scale data pipeline and data monitoring system to make sure overall pipeline is healthy.', 'Imagine what you could do here. Powerlytics, is a cutting edge, venture backed company with a portfolio of products and solutions underpinned by predictive analytics powered by proprietary databases of the anonymized tax returns of all households (150 million+) and for-profit businesses (30 million+) in the U.S. Powerlytics’ clients include top 5 banks, insurance companies, asset managers as well as alternative lenders, marketing firms and global consulting firms, among others. Powerlytics team is looking for a highly qualified Principal Data Engineer experienced with big data and large-scale analytics systems for our team’s substantial data analytics needs. This is an outstanding opportunity to join a focused team and work collaboratively to make a significant impact on our organization. You will be contributing to a large-scale data platform and providing end-to-end analytics solutions to transform rich data at Powerlytics scale into actionable insights. Your data sets will help us determine important features, monitor data product launches and understand data usage and quality in detail. We are looking for Data Engineers who love to build end to end analytics solutions for their customers and can produce high quality data artifacts at scale. The ideal candidate has experience implementing extendable frameworks on top of Spark and understands the inner workings of Spark execution.']

['', 'Responsibilities:', 'Hands on experience in genomic applications including techniques and applications such as nucleic acid extractions, qPCR, PCR', 'Requirements', 'This combination of skills will be used to aid Applications Scientists from the Automation and Genomics Reagent teams by running defined experiments based on published protocols both manually and utilizing liquid handling robotics. The individual will also assist in documenting the experiments for internal and external customer consumption.', '\xa0', 'Apex Systems is looking for Development Scientists in the Indianapolis, IN area!', 'Preferred: Experience programming and operating automated liquid handlers', 'Follows established research procedures with minimal direct supervision.', 'Follows established research procedures with minimal direct supervision.Works collaboratively, with cross-functional team to develop, optimize and deliver data-demonstrated Biomek methods.Enables accurate interpretation of results and delivery of consistent and robust Biomek solutions by making detailed observations from their executed experiments to plan.Conducts experiments to troubleshoot deviations from expected chemistry performance.Uses manual and automated techniques to prepare Next Generation Sequencing libraries.', 'You will enable our team to meet increased demand by serving as an Application Development Scientist responsible for running an automated liquid handler to optimize the conversion of NGS library preparation from manual to automated methods. Data generated by you will be used for proof of principle and launch of the Demonstrated Applications.', 'Has a good understanding of scientific methods, preferably with a concentration in molecular or cell biology.', 'Conducts experiments to troubleshoot deviations from expected chemistry performance.', 'Follows all company safety policies & other safety precautions within work area (BSL2 Lab)', 'Summary', 'MS or BS in Biology fields, Biochemistry, Biotechnology, Chemistry or related fields and 2+ years of recent laboratory experience including NGS library preparation', 'Uses manual and automated techniques to prepare Next Generation Sequencing libraries.', 'As an Application Development Scientist within the Automation R&D team you will help support the design and demonstration of applications to be released to scientists running chemistry. You will have solid knowledge of laboratory procedures and the science, technology and sample preparation involved in genomic applications such as nucleic acid extractions, next generation sequencing, PCR techniques, nucleic acid quantitative and qualitative analysis. The ideal candidate has exposure to laboratory equipment used for qualitative analysis of nucleic acids and has experience programming and running automated liquid handling instrumentation.', 'Works collaboratively, with cross-functional team to develop, optimize and deliver data-demonstrated Biomek methods.', 'MS or BS in Biology fields, Biochemistry, Biotechnology, Chemistry or related fields and 2+ years of recent laboratory experience including NGS library preparationHas a good understanding of scientific methods, preferably with a concentration in molecular or cell biology.Hands on experience in genomic applications including techniques and applications such as nucleic acid extractions, qPCR, PCRFollows all company safety policies & other safety precautions within work area (BSL2 Lab)', ':', 'The position is on-site and located in Indianapolis, IN', 'Requirements:', 'Enables accurate interpretation of results and delivery of consistent and robust Biomek solutions by making detailed observations from their executed experiments to plan.']

['', "As our ideal person for this role, you will understand how data should be securely stored, consumed, and managed. You'll use your expertise to develop and innovate technical solutions to meet the needs of the business. You are passionate about data, problem-solving, and driven to achieve great results for customers. ", 'ABOUT THE ROLE:', '3+ years hands-on experience writing complex, highly-optimized SQL queries across large data sets. ', ' Contribute and drive high-quality engineering practices towards building data infrastructure and pipelines at scale.  Partner with cross-functional engineering teams to define highly scalable and reliable architectures for global data stores and data lakes.  Provide technical leadership, oversight, and guidance for the data/schema.  Design data models for optimal storage and retrieval and optimize the data architecture to meet critical product and business requirements.  Collaborate with engineering and data science teams to understand data challenges and provide scalable and flexible solutions.  Understand logging, event processing and how it impacts rest of our data flow, architect logging best practices where needed.  Establish architectural approaches and patterns that incorporate modernizing data governance, metadata management and data quality.  Architect and implement data governance and security for the data platforms. ['', 'Experience in assay development, mammalian cell and insect cell culture, ELISA, Western blotting, qPCR, and experience in standard molecular biology techniques such as cloning, protein expression and purification is preferred.', 'BS degree from an accredited institution in a relevant scientific discipline required, plus one year relevant experience preferred; or MS degree from an accredited institution in a relevant scientific discipline', 'Exceptional interpersonal skills;', 'Experience with mammalian cell and insect cell culture, and in standard molecular biology techniques such as cloning, DNA purification, and protein expression is preferred.', 'Proficient in Microsoft Office.', 'Requirements', 'Generate documentation (ex. method protocols, reports, SOPs) in support of techniques or modification of techniques.', 'Proactive and resourceful.', 'Initiates, executes, completes, and communicates results and related issues with supervision.', 'Accountable for performing all techniques and assays so test sessions yield valid results and repeated work is minimized.', ' BS degree from an accredited institution in a relevant scientific discipline required, plus one year relevant experience preferred; or MS degree from an accredited institution in a relevant scientific discipline Able to competently perform multiple types of assays (biochemical, molecular and immunological in nature). Experience in assay development, mammalian cell and insect cell culture, ELISA, Western blotting, qPCR, and experience in standard molecular biology techniques such as cloning, protein expression and purification is preferred. Strict adherence to defined assay method protocols. Extremely organized with attention to detail. Can learn new types of assays and technology easily. Exceptional written and verbal communications skills. Proactive and resourceful. Proficient in Microsoft Office. Exceptional interpersonal skills; High level of comfort/ease interacting with all levels of the organization.  ', 'Accurately record all data from research techniques and tests on data capture forms, research notebooks, and raw data notebooks as appropriate.', 'Can learn new types of assays and technology easily.', 'Execute in vitro analytical assays to evaluate samples with minimal supervision.', 'Experience in performing bio-analytical methods (immunological, microbiological, molecular biological, or virological) following defined processes.', 'Exceptional written and verbal communications skills.', 'Summary', ' Experience in performing bio-analytical methods (immunological, microbiological, molecular biological, or virological) following defined processes. Experience with mammalian cell and insect cell culture, and in standard molecular biology techniques such as cloning, DNA purification, and protein expression is preferred. Initiates, executes, completes, and communicates results and related issues with supervision. Provide quality support of Expression Platforms team members through data acquisition, reporting, and communication. Execute in vitro analytical assays to evaluate samples with minimal supervision. Accountable for performing all techniques and assays so test sessions yield valid results and repeated work is minimized. Accurately record all data from research techniques and tests on data capture forms, research notebooks, and raw data notebooks as appropriate. Perform initial data analysis so that accurate and precise results are obtained and reported. Generate documentation (ex. method protocols, reports, SOPs) in support of techniques or modification of techniques. Can learn new types of assays and technology easily. Be able to perform, analyze and interpret results. Maintains a constructive and positive attitude for working on projects in the Expression Platforms Team Follow Research & Development policies and procedures to maintain high quality standards and follow best practices. ', 'Able to competently perform multiple types of assays (biochemical, molecular and immunological in nature).', 'Strict adherence to defined assay method protocols.', 'Maintains a constructive and positive attitude for working on projects in the Expression Platforms Team', 'Extremely organized with attention to detail.', 'Be able to perform, analyze and interpret results.', 'Provide quality support of Expression Platforms team members through data acquisition, reporting, and communication.', 'Follow Research & Development policies and procedures to maintain high quality standards and follow best practices.', 'Perform initial data analysis so that accurate and precise results are obtained and reported.', 'High level of comfort/ease interacting with all levels of the organization. for data analysis and experimentation and Fortran for core NWP system component development', 'Deep understanding of data assimilation methodologies and systems such as the Gridpoint Statistical Interpolation (GSI) data assimilation (DA) system and/or the WRF-DA (WRFDA), Data Assimilation Research Testbed (DART), and the Joint Effort for Data assimilation Integration (JEDI) systems', weather forecasts and data. job_title: Associate Scientist/Scientist, Health Care Analytical – Monograph Reform and Measurement Science
job_text: ['', 'A strong commitment to genuine learning and good science is necessary. Operate with a high level of attention to detail and technical rigor across Health Care Analytical. Have the ability to work on multiple projects/deliverables at any given time and be able to adapt to changing priorities while consistently delivering against commitments with excellence. Experience in cGMPs and test method validation/stability requirements for FDA regulated products is a plus.', 'About Us', 'A strong record of innovation working with R&D partners and lab personnel to understand key needs and providing/implementing solutions to complex problems; capable of providing monograph reform/measurement science leadership for the team and designing/implementing an action plan to deliver robust solutions.', 'Skills You Can Expect To Learn/build In This Job', 'Mastery in Analytical chemistry, reflected by a BS or MS in chemistry or at least five years’ experience in a closely related field. Experience/Training in Technical Writing is highly desired. Technical curiosity and a passion to continually learn and develop mastery across OTC regulated products and analytical methods/techniques is required.Proven track record of cross functional collaboration is a must. Form productive, collaborative relationships with partners across various R&D functions to lead/execute monograph reform programs and Oral Care project deliverables. The individual will leverage his/her internal and external networks to help drive innovation, enable problem solving and influence project direction.A strong record of innovation working with R&D partners and lab personnel to understand key needs and providing/implementing solutions to complex problems; capable of providing monograph reform/measurement science leadership for the team and designing/implementing an action plan to deliver robust solutions.Effective oral/written communication skills are needed, including the ability to document/share critical insights/observations/results, and provide clear/concise technical summaries via written reports. Excellent record keeping and note-booking skills are also required.Have a history of driving projects to success through proactive leadership. Be comfortable with taking ownership/initiative and independence, leading by example, operating with discipline and working with a sense of urgency.A strong commitment to genuine learning and good science is necessary. Operate with a high level of attention to detail and technical rigor across Health Care Analytical. Have the ability to work on multiple projects/deliverables at any given time and be able to adapt to changing priorities while consistently delivering against commitments with excellence. Experience in cGMPs and test method validation/stability requirements for FDA regulated products is a plus.', 'Proven track record of cross functional collaboration is a must. Form productive, collaborative relationships with partners across various R&D functions to lead/execute monograph reform programs and Oral Care project deliverables. The individual will leverage his/her internal and external networks to help drive innovation, enable problem solving and influence project direction.', 'Effective oral/written communication skills are needed, including the ability to document/share critical insights/observations/results, and provide clear/concise technical summaries via written reports. Excellent record keeping and note-booking skills are also required.', 'Description', 'Whatweoffer', 'Qualifications', 'Mastery in Analytical chemistry, reflected by a BS or MS in chemistry or at least five years’ experience in a closely related field. Experience/Training in Technical Writing is highly desired. Technical curiosity and a passion to continually learn and develop mastery across OTC regulated products and analytical methods/techniques is required.', 'Skills needed to perform this job:', 'Have a history of driving projects to success through proactive leadership. Be comfortable with taking ownership/initiative and independence, leading by example, operating with discipline and working with a sense of urgency.']

['Necessary Qualifications:\xa0', '', 'We know that innovation thrives on product teams where diverse points of view come together to solve hard problems in ways that are just now possible. As such, we explicitly seek people that bring diverse life experiences, diverse educational backgrounds, diverse cultures, and diverse work experiences.\xa0', 'Our\xa0product managers that are not afraid of signing up for results, even when this means they\xa0must\xa0work through others to achieve the necessary results.\xa0You will need to be able to influence your teammates, as well as colleagues, stakeholders, and key executives, through your use of data and logic.\xa0', 'Our\xa0product teams solve hard problems – customer problems and business problems – in ways that our customers love\xa0and\xa0yet work for our business. Our product teams are cross-functional and durable, generally comprised of a product manager, a product designer, and several engineers.\xa0', 'Demonstrated understanding of the techniques and methods of modern product discovery and product delivery.\xa0', 'We staff our product teams with the skills necessary to come up with effective solutions that are\u202fvaluable\u202f(our customers choose to buy or use),\u202fviable\u202f(the solution works within the many constraints of the business),\u202fusable\u202f(the user can figure out how to use) and\u202ffeasible\u202f(our engineers have the skills and technology to implement).\xa0', 'Diverse Perspectives:', '5\xa0years working on technology-powered products as either a product manager, product designer, engineer, data analyst, data scientist, or user researcher.\u202f\xa0', 'Demonstrated ability to figure out solutions to hard problems with many constraints, using sound judgement to assess risks, and to lay out your argument in a well-structured, data-informed, written narrative.\xa0', '\xa0', 'Necessary Qualifications:', 'feasible', 'We look for product managers that understand that consistent innovation is the result of each member of the product team contributing their passion and their ideas. The product manager must collaborate closely with her product designer and engineers to discover effective solutions, and then work together to deliver those solutions to market.\xa0', 'Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience.\xa0', 'Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience.\xa0Demonstrated understanding of the techniques and methods of modern product discovery and product delivery.\xa05\xa0years working on technology-powered products as either a product manager, product designer, engineer, data analyst, data scientist, or user researcher.\u202f\xa0Demonstrated ability to figure out solutions to hard problems with many constraints, using sound judgement to assess risks, and to lay out your argument in a well-structured, data-informed, written narrative.\xa0Proven ability to engage with engineers, designers, and company leaders in a constructive and collaborative relationship.\xa0', 'viable', 'Proven ability to engage with engineers, designers, and company leaders in a constructive and collaborative relationship.\xa0', 'Diverse Perspectives:\xa0', 'Our\xa0product manager must contribute to\xa0their\xa0product team a solid knowledge of the various constraints of the business – constraints from marketing, sales, service, finance, legal, and privacy are typical examples. The product manager must also contribute to the product team a deep knowledge of our users and customers, and the data about how our customers engage with our products. Finally,\xa0our\xa0product managers\xa0are\xa0expected to track industry trends and the competitive landscape as they pertain to her product.\xa0', 'valuable', 'usable']

job_title: Research Scientist for the School of Biomedical Informatics
company: The University of Texas Health Science Center at Houston (UTHealth)
job_text: ['', 'Provides work direction and guidance to personnel within department. May lead projects and activities.', '51.215', 'Conducts experiments using advanced equipment and applying complex techniques. Procedures may include tissue culture, protein purification, enzyme purification, enzyme assays, membrane protein purification, monoclonal antibody analysis, cytogenic analysis, gel electrophoresis, immunoelectrophoresis, immunofluorescent method, radioimmunoassays, biometry, biofeedback, neurotransmitter analysis, biospectrometry, microtomy, liquid, gas and thin layer chromatography, microspectrophotometry, tissue processing, tissue staining, behavioral testing, anesthetic dosage, neurohistochemistry, animal surgery, immunochemistry, gel electrophoresis, deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA) testing, electron microscopy, and biophysical assays and measurements.', 'Physical Requirements', 'Position Summary', 'Performs other duties as assigned.', 'Designs experimental procedures, which may involve examining new techniques, that may improve existing analysis and provide additional capabilities.', 'Maintains lab equipment, assists in necessary repairs, and promotes a safe laboratory environment. Ensures direct reports follow safety procedures and attends basic safety training courses.', 'Evaluates the data from the analysis. ', 'Presents results in a written paper for publication, in a presentation at a meeting, or through personal contact with faculty members and other researchers. ', 'Position Key Accountabilities', 'Security Sensitive', 'Minimum Education', 'Plans and performs quantitative and qualitative research procedures in various areas of biology, chemistry, physics, and other biomedical, dental, or related scientific areas. Identifies the problem through contact with other researchers, practicing physicians, or literature searches. Formulates a problem or project to research. Designs procedures to solve the problem. ', 'Determines feasibility of possible projects to ensure results will have a significant impact. Determines project feasibility in terms of staff, time, and resources. ', ' Determines feasibility of possible projects to ensure results will have a significant impact. Determines project feasibility in terms of staff, time, and resources.  Plans and performs quantitative and qualitative research procedures in various areas of biology, chemistry, physics, and other biomedical, dental, or related scientific areas. Identifies the problem through contact with other researchers, practicing physicians, or literature searches. Formulates a problem or project to research. Designs procedures to solve the problem.  Conducts experiments using advanced equipment and applying complex techniques. Procedures may include tissue culture, protein purification, enzyme purification, enzyme assays, membrane protein purification, monoclonal antibody analysis, cytogenic analysis, gel electrophoresis, immunoelectrophoresis, immunofluorescent method, radioimmunoassays, biometry, biofeedback, neurotransmitter analysis, biospectrometry, microtomy, liquid, gas and thin layer chromatography, microspectrophotometry, tissue processing, tissue staining, behavioral testing, anesthetic dosage, neurohistochemistry, animal surgery, immunochemistry, gel electrophoresis, deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA) testing, electron microscopy, and biophysical assays and measurements. Designs experimental procedures, which may involve examining new techniques, that may improve existing analysis and provide additional capabilities. Evaluates the data from the analysis.  Presents results in a written paper for publication, in a presentation at a meeting, or through personal contact with faculty members and other researchers.  Maintains lab equipment, assists in necessary repairs, and promotes a safe laboratory environment. Ensures direct reports follow safety procedures and attends basic safety training courses. Provides work direction and guidance to personnel within department. May lead projects and activities. Performs other duties as assigned. ', 'Minimum Experience']

['', 'Responsibilities:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Testing programmed screeners', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Development and execution of formal qual training programs', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in consumer research', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Produce video highlight reels and other innovative reporting deliverables', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Presenting results to clients', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaboration with clients across all phases of research studies', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Knowledge and hands on experience running qualitative projects including:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Selecting the most appropriate research methodology and techniques', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Schedule and run weekly/monthly virtual client meetings', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Proven ability to provide flawless deliverables', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Moderating remote sessions, groups, and discussions', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Review and onboarding of new qualitative tools, platforms, and partners', 'We work well together and enjoy what we do. We are looking for a team member who thrives in a creative, high-energy, fast-paced environment who can work independently and is highly productive with a commitment to the highest quality and ethical standards: someone who “gets” consumer research in today’s new media world and is driven to be the best they can with the desire to grow professionally.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with online and mobile qualitative research tools', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Manage multiple high-level client accounts and corresponding projects', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Onboarding and management of international partners/vendors', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelors or advanced degree', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Coordinating participant recruitment with the qual fieldwork team', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in quantitative research a plus', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ensuring perfection in data quality and deliverables', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience conducting UX research studies in-person and remotely a plus', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Formal moderation training/experience (e.g. RIVA)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Execution and management all phases of a research initiative—from design through report delivery', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Passionate about research and analysis', 'Position Summary:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in Youth & Family, Media & Entertainment and Technology industries a plus', 'Qualitative Researcher', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Developing activity guides', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Determining research participant qualifying criteria', 'Exciting opportunity to join a fast growing, dynamic and innovative marketing research firm. You will be joining the leader in new research technologies and innovative approaches to gaining consumer insights where every team member is considered a valued and integral component to our success. We have special expertise in digital research, the media & entertainment industry, youth and families (kids, Gen-Z, Millennials, Parents), and technology industries.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Developing and managing project schedules and budgets ensuring that all phases of a project are accomplished on schedule and on/under budget', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Practical experience with a wide array of qualitative research methodologies', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Producing topline and executive summary reports', 'We are in a rapid growth phase; become part of this exciting company and grow with us!', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Exceptional written, oral, and presentation communication abilities', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Communicating with clients to understand and document the research objectives', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Integrating secondary data sources when applicable', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Exceptional hands-on day-to-day project management skills', 'Innovation and Excellence', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Managing, mentoring, and training of project directors and associates', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Developing new methodologies to meet client project requirements as needed', 'Requirements:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Programming activities on online qual platforms (insight communities, discussion boards, diary/ethnography studies, UX studies)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A minimum of 5 years within the custom Market Research industry (supplier side)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent organizational skills with a strong focus upon managing details', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Writing qualitative screeners', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Supervising all personnel on projects', 'The Qualitative Researcher is responsible for the execution and management of all phases of a research initiative from design through report delivery and ensuring the successful execution of the research.\xa0The Qualitative Researcher takes the principal responsibility for the project running smoothly and liaising with clients and TSR management. The Qualitative Research has primary responsibility for meeting time and cost constraints, ensuring quality, providing deliverables to client satisfaction and objectives for projects assigned. Prepares the final report and deliverables or works closely with project directors and associates to ensure that report is produced per specifications and client objectives. Presents findings to client or in collaboration with the research team. Involved in proposal generation and account management. A key responsibility of the Qualitative Research is client relations and business development--expanding existing business and cultivating new business—and ensuring that our standards of excellence are always reflected in our work. The Qualitative Researcher is responsible for managing, mentoring, and training of project directors and associates in research methodology, analysis and project management. A key role is to innovate and help develop new methodologies and leverage new tools, in collaboration with the executive team, in pursuit of our mission: Innovation and Excellence.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Setting up remote IDI’s, focus groups and UX sessions', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Writing research proposals and preparing cost estimates']

Maintain membership in professional, academic, and research organizations.   Supervise and mentor students.   Participate in proposal development for potential external and internal funding. job_title: Clinical Research Scientist with Hematology / Oncology
job_text: ['', "Advanced Degree in Life Sciences (e.g., nursing, pharmacy or related medical field), minimum 5 years' experience in clinical research development or equivalent.", 'Minimum 6 yrs. experience in oncology/hematology clinical development.', 'Review and query of hematology/oncology data including: safety, primary efficacy variables, and laboratory data.', 'Experience in protocol development, study report preparation, Investigator Brochure preparation, regulatory submissions.', 'Full understanding GCP and ICH Guidelines.', ' Assist the Clinical Research Scientist team to interface with project team members including: Clinical Research Physician, Clinical Operations, Data Management, Statistics, Drug Safety, Regulatory and Project Management. Review and query of hematology/oncology data including: safety, primary efficacy variables, and laboratory data. Assist with protocol preparation (writing, reviewing, amending and cross-functional facilitation as appropriate). Assist with Study Start up Activities and data base build. Participate or lead in Scientific meetings (i.e. Ad-Board, Steering Committee, Data Monitoring Committee). ', 'Assist with Study Start up Activities and data base build.', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills and interpersonal skills.', 'Assist with protocol preparation (writing, reviewing, amending and cross-functional facilitation as appropriate).', 'Assist the Clinical Research Scientist team to interface with project team members including: Clinical Research Physician, Clinical Operations, Data Management, Statistics, Drug Safety, Regulatory and Project Management.', 'Demonstrated ability to work as part of a team.', 'CLINICAL RESEARCH SCIENTIST WITH HEMATOLOGY/ONCOLOGY ', 'Participate or lead in Scientific meetings (i.e. Ad-Board, Steering Committee, Data Monitoring Committee).', 'Proficient at data interpretation.', 'Job Description', 'Project Description', 'SUMMIT, NJ', 'Knowledge of clinical trial design, basic statistics, and data review tools.', 'Required Skills:', 'Proficient in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint; Microsoft project a plus), JReview, EDC (Rave).', 'Detail-oriented, well-organized.', 'Ability to assimilate technical and scientific information quickly.', 'Hematology experience (plus). Protocol authoring (preferred). Data review and medical monitoring of data (required).', " Advanced Degree in Life Sciences (e.g., nursing, pharmacy or related medical field), minimum 5 years' experience in clinical research development or equivalent. Hematology experience (plus). Protocol authoring (preferred). Data review and medical monitoring of data (required). Minimum 6 yrs. experience in oncology/hematology clinical development. Excellent written and verbal communication skills and interpersonal skills. Knowledge of clinical trial design, basic statistics, and data review tools. Proficient at data interpretation. Experience in protocol development, study report preparation, Investigator Brochure preparation, regulatory submissions. Full understanding GCP and ICH Guidelines. Detail-oriented, well-organized. Ability to assimilate technical and scientific information quickly. Proficient in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint; Microsoft project a plus), JReview, EDC (Rave). Demonstrated ability to work as part of a team. "]

['', 'TikTok is committed to providing reasonable accommodations during our recruitment process. If you need assistance or an accommodation, please reach out to us at usrc@tiktok.com.', '• Great communication and teamwork skills', '• Understand product objectives and improve trust and safety strategy and model iterations', "• Bachelor's or above degree in computer science or a related technical discipline, with 2+ years’ industrial experience", '• Passion about techniques and solving challenging problems', '• Build industry-leading trust and safety systems for TikTok', '• Solid experience in at least one of the following areas: machine learning, pattern recognition, NLP, data mining, or computer vision', '• Experience in trust and safety is a plus', 'Qualifications', "Responsibilities - What You'II Do", '• Work with cross-functional teams to protect TikTok globally', '• Well understanding of data structures and algorithms', '• Develop highly-scalable classifiers, tools, models and algorithms leveraging cutting-edge machine learning, computer vision and data mining technologies', 'Our Trust and Safety engineering team is responsible for developing state-of-the-art machine learning models and algorithms to protect our platform and users from bad content and abusive behaviors. With the continuous efforts from our trust and safety team, TikTok is able to provide the best user experience and bring joy to everyone in the world.', 'TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Mumbai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.', "TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We believe individuals shouldn't be disadvantaged because of their background or identity, but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience. We are passionate about this and hope you are too."]

job_title: Quantitative Medicine, Statistical Machine Learning Scientist
job_text: ['', "leverage statistics and predictive modeling techniques including machine learning to evolve model-based drug development within key therapeutic areas (Parkinson’s, Alzheimer’s, Crohn's, Neonatal, Infectious, etc.)", 'Background', 'Responsibilities/Experience:', 'great technical, presentation, and communication skills', 'leverage machine learning, NLP, and deep learning on clinical patient data that provide insights into disease: progression, evolution, and prevention', 'must have a PhD in a quantitative discipline', 'must have a PhD in a quantitative disciplinemust have strong Statistics background including predictive modeling and machine learningproficiency with Python or R\xa0great technical, presentation, and communication skillshealthcare analytics is highly desired', 'this is a senior individual contributor role that is both hands-on analytics and strategic\xa0', 'Background: Nonprofit neutral third party that develops artificial intelligence (AI) solutions to accelerate drug development seeks a Data Scientist to join its Quantitative Medicine Sciences group. Data Scientist will leverage applied statistics and machine learning to evolve many patient initiatives.', 'What Will You Do:', 'use statistical quantitative methods to analyze clinical sensor data and provide insights on disease progression', 'proficiency with Python or R\xa0', 'apply machine learning and statistics to generate synthetic data used to solve complex disease scenarios', 'More Info:', 'healthcare analytics is highly desired', 'provide statistical machine learning support to regulatory agencies on critical findings on analysis performed', "leverage statistics and predictive modeling techniques including machine learning to evolve model-based drug development within key therapeutic areas (Parkinson’s, Alzheimer’s, Crohn's, Neonatal, Infectious, etc.)use statistical quantitative methods to analyze clinical sensor data and provide insights on disease progressionleverage machine learning, NLP, and deep learning on clinical patient data that provide insights into disease: progression, evolution, and preventionapply machine learning and statistics to generate synthetic data used to solve complex disease scenariosprovide statistical machine learning support to regulatory agencies on critical findings on analysis performed", 'must have strong Statistics background including predictive modeling and machine learning', 'this is a senior individual contributor role that is both hands-on analytics and strategic\xa0relocation to the Tucson, AZ provided, can be REMOTE for experienced candidates, visa OK', 'relocation to the Tucson, AZ provided, can be REMOTE for experienced candidates, visa OK', 'Ping Me: sunil@analyticrecruiting.com']

job_title: Senior UX Researcher & Staff/Lead UX Researcher
job_text: ['', 'Company', 'Influence architectural design tasks such as user flows, information architecture definition, wireframing, etc. with the aim of communicating design opportunities to the broader Design and Product teams. ', 'What You Get To Do In This Role', 'Can quickly understand customer needs, taking the initiative to interact with customers, managing expectations, responding to their requests, and communicating feedback in a simple, clear, and concise manner. ', 'Work directly with external vendors to procure research sample, research reports, and partner on research projects as needed. ', 'Text analysis and coding of open-end responses which might include product feature requests, problem reports, discussion forums, and community discussions. ', 'Apply appropriate research techniques and methods for the specific project. Methods such as individual customer interviews, focus groups, diary studies, journey mapping, user flows, information architecture definition, wireframing and others to aid in the formulation of insights that improve product functionality and user experience. ', "Represent the needs of ServiceNow customers or partners and their end users associated with ServiceNow's products, competing products, or future concepts. ", 'Willing to be proactive and take initiative to learn about ServiceNow products and customers. ', 'Execute various types of primary research and analysis, from early discovery, usage and needs, through product design validation. ', 'Work collaboratively inside a cross-functional team, effectively integrating your research into the product definition and design phases. ', 'Analyze and synthesize data in order to generate strategic and tactical insights with actionable recommendations that drive product improvements, innovations, and customer experience improvements. ', 'Ability to work independently on complex projects requiring frequent problem solving and critical thinking.', 'Prepare reports of findings, create PowerPoint and Excel reports, explaining methods used and insights learned, and presenting research results to key stakeholders and leadership (C-Level, director level). ', 'Proven history of independently defining, planning and executing research strategies including defining objectives, goals, timelines and ability to select the appropriate methodology for the project. This includes developing sample plans and designing data collection instruments. ', 'Team ', 'Min 6+ years of direct experience or equivalent combination of education and experience in user experience, product, customer, market or academic research. Preferably for product development purposes. Proven history of independently defining, planning and executing research strategies including defining objectives, goals, timelines and ability to select the appropriate methodology for the project. This includes developing sample plans and designing data collection instruments. Advanced knowledge of several data collection methods (either qualitative or quantitative) and fundamental knowledge of mixed methods. Can quickly understand customer needs, taking the initiative to interact with customers, managing expectations, responding to their requests, and communicating feedback in a simple, clear, and concise manner. Demonstrates confidence in the data collection process which is evidenced by the ability to naturally engage users and in the aptitude to respond with insightful follow-up questions which increases richness of research data. Knowledge of user interface design principles, usability evaluation techniques, perception, cognition, task analysis, experimental design and fundamental knowledge of statistics to best inform useful and usable recommendations. Advanced/Exceptional written and oral communication abilities. Can prepare reports of findings, illustrating research data graphically and translating complex findings into written text. Experience working with and presenting research results to executive leadership (C-Level, director level). Willing to be proactive and take initiative to learn about ServiceNow products and customers. Ability to work independently on complex projects requiring frequent problem solving and critical thinking.', 'Collaborate on feature definition and user story creation as needed. ', 'In Order To Be Successful, You Need To Have', 'Develop strategic research plans including discussion guides, contingency plans and other instruments from rough outline to the final version. ', 'Partner closely with Product Management to influence product strategy and roadmaps with validated user research findings. ', 'Demonstrates confidence in the data collection process which is evidenced by the ability to naturally engage users and in the aptitude to respond with insightful follow-up questions which increases richness of research data. ', 'Senior UX Researcher and Staff/Lead UX Researcher', "Represent the needs of ServiceNow customers or partners and their end users associated with ServiceNow's products, competing products, or future concepts. Collaborate with key stakeholders including designers, other researchers, and product managers to identify objectives, goals, timelines and research execution plan. Work directly with external vendors to procure research sample, research reports, and partner on research projects as needed. Execute various types of primary research and analysis, from early discovery, usage and needs, through product design validation. Apply appropriate research techniques and methods for the specific project. Methods such as individual customer interviews, focus groups, diary studies, journey mapping, user flows, information architecture definition, wireframing and others to aid in the formulation of insights that improve product functionality and user experience. Develop strategic research plans including discussion guides, contingency plans and other instruments from rough outline to the final version. Partner closely with Product Management to influence product strategy and roadmaps with validated user research findings. Collaborate on feature definition and user story creation as needed. Work collaboratively inside a cross-functional team, effectively integrating your research into the product definition and design phases. Influence architectural design tasks such as user flows, information architecture definition, wireframing, etc. with the aim of communicating design opportunities to the broader Design and Product teams. Text analysis and coding of open-end responses which might include product feature requests, problem reports, discussion forums, and community discussions. Analyze and synthesize data in order to generate strategic and tactical insights with actionable recommendations that drive product improvements, innovations, and customer experience improvements. Prepare reports of findings, create PowerPoint and Excel reports, explaining methods used and insights learned, and presenting research results to key stakeholders and leadership (C-Level, director level). ", 'Min 6+ years of direct experience or equivalent combination of education and experience in user experience, product, customer, market or academic research. Preferably for product development purposes. ', 'Collaborate with key stakeholders including designers, other researchers, and product managers to identify objectives, goals, timelines and research execution plan. ', 'Knowledge of user interface design principles, usability evaluation techniques, perception, cognition, task analysis, experimental design and fundamental knowledge of statistics to best inform useful and usable recommendations. ', 'Advanced/Exceptional written and oral communication abilities. Can prepare reports of findings, illustrating research data graphically and translating complex findings into written text. Experience working with and presenting research results to executive leadership (C-Level, director level). ', 'Advanced knowledge of several data collection methods (either qualitative or quantitative) and fundamental knowledge of mixed methods. ', 'Role ', 'Location (Pick only locations that are applicable): ']

['', 'Other Requirements:', "Preferably A bachelor's degree or higherExtensive knowledge about back pain treatment and mechanicsStrong writing and communication skillsScientific aptitudeCurious Mind", 'Please do not respond unless you have a deep understanding of statistics and experience in interpreting medical research data.', 'Who we are:', 'On a daily basis you will work with the content team to write informative and entertaining materials coaching individuals through pain trigger avoidance and exercises. You will evaluate clinical trials to separate what truly works from obsolete practices. You will substantiate claims and recommendations.\xa0', 'The ideal candidate will have a high degree of intellectual curiosity and be able to solve problems. We want someone who can grow.', 'You will read medical textbooks, scientific journals, and clinical trial summaries. Your job will be deducing practical applications from them and developing easy-to-follow guidance.\xa0', 'Curious Mind', 'You will interview patients to identify areas of confusion or difficulty then make improvement recommendations to our programming team. You will take complex medical concepts and make them easy to understand for the average person. The content you create should be engaging, concise and scientifically accurate.\xa0', 'Digital Therapeutics company looking for someone to help develop and improve an innovative back pain program. Must have extensive knowledge about back pain causes, mechanics and treatments.', 'Details:', 'Scientific aptitude', 'Extensive knowledge about back pain treatment and mechanics', "Preferably A bachelor's degree or higher", 'You will work remotely.\xa0', 'We are a\xa0digital therapeutics start-up based in Charlotte NC. Our vision is to improve the lives of those who suffer from chronic low back pain by providing evidence-based therapy through a patient’s mobile phone. This includes customized videos and articles about posture, better lifting techniques, the psychology of pain as well as exercises to improve core endurance. Digital Therapeutics lies at the intersection of technology and medicine. We seek to make high-quality personalized care affordable for everyone.', 'Strong writing and communication skills', "In your cover letter tell us briefly about why you would be good for this opportunity and your experience with the field of back pain. Also, provide links to examples of writing you've done."]

", "  You will be part of the technology function for Marcus, focusing on building a business intelligence and Analytics platform that enables the business to operate efficiently. You should be able to quickly build visualizations and semantic layers on top of AWS / Hadoop / Sybase / Oracle data to meet business needs, as well as be the thought leader to influence functional heads on new and innovate ways to visualize and report data that will help drive business value. You will help design data models to support new and existing Lines of business(s) to enable business teams make accurate, timely and reliable decisions.   You will participate in data architecture decisions and partner with technology teams to implement data products in production systems.   You will work closely with business partners and technology leaders to evaluate new BI tools that can further enhance the business' ability to analyze data. You should be able to commercialize data products and influence leadership on the value of these products. Qualifications  Advanced degree in Engineering, Computer Science or related disciplines. Hands-on experience with one or more mainstream programming languages (Python, Java, C, Scala, C++, etc.).   Hands-on experience with one or more relational database systems (Sybase, Snowflake, Oracle).   Experience in building data products from ideation to implementation. ['', 'Our team consists of engineers that are passionate about creating finely polished and intuitive experiences and, at the same time, obsess over the performance and reliability of what we build. We challenge the status quo and strive towards finding the best way to solve problems.', 'Qualifications\xa0', 'Spin is committed to providing reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities in its job application procedures. If you need assistance or an accommodation due to a disability, you may contact us at job_accommodations@spin.pm.', 'Opportunity to join a fast-growing startup and help shape and establish the company’s industry leadership', 'About Spin', 'Wellness perk for salaried roles', 'Built and maintained data warehouses and ETL pipelines', 'Deep understanding of distributed systems', 'Spin is a fast-growing micromobility company committed to a world with clean air, liveable cities, safe streets, and widespread access to convenient, affordable transportation. If you’re searching for a top-tier career where you can make a difference and dynamically collaborate within a creative, lively environment—Spin welcomes you!', 'Minimum of 7+ years of relevant experience in building and architecting data solutions', 'We are looking for Lead Data Engineers that will build and maintain our data warehouse and data pipelines, collect data from multiple sources, and expose services that make data a first-class citizen at Spin. You will be building, architecting and launching highly reliable and scalable data pipelines to support data processing and analytics needs and work closely with Data Analysts, Data Scientists, and Engineers on coming up with new data models and exploring new data sources to add to our Analytic Data Warehouse.', 'Scaling up our data infrastructure to meet business needs', 'Worked with Cloud-based architecture such as AWS or Google Cloud', 'Opportunity to join a fast-growing startup and help shape and establish the company’s industry leadershipCompetitive health benefitsUnlimited PTO for salaried rolesPre-tax commuter benefitsMonthly cell phone bill stipendWellness perk for salaried roles', 'Build and maintain our data warehouse and data pipelinesScaling up our data infrastructure to meet business needsDeploy sophisticated analytics programs, machine learning, and statistical methodsWork cross-functionally with our product, business, finance, and engineering teams', 'Monthly cell phone bill stipend', 'Responsibilities', 'You have worked with big data solutions like Redshift, Snowflake, Hadoop or Hive', 'Unlimited PTO for salaried roles', 'Expert in SQL and high-level languages such as Python, Java, or Scala', 'About the Role', "Spin is an equal opportunity employer and will not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment in an unlawful matter. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all individuals. Spin treats all employees and job applicants on the basis of merit, qualifications, and competence without regard to any qualified individuals' sex, race, color, religion, national origin, ancestry, gender (including pregnancy, breastfeeding, or related medical condition), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, physical or mental disability, medical condition, genetic characteristic or information, marital status, military and veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by state or federal law. Spin also considers qualified applicants with criminal histories, consistent with applicable local, state, and federal law.", 'You will be working with BigQuery, DBT, Airflow, Python, Fivetran, Kafka, git and Looker, and we welcome new ideas.', 'Work cross-functionally with our product, business, finance, and engineering teams', 'Competitive health benefits', 'We are a diverse team of artists, engineers, designers, urban planners, policymakers, marketers, and operators. We believe in inclusivity and build powerful alliances to fulfill our goals and move our mission forward. Above all, we at Spin are connected by our values and #BeOrange spirit, which represents unity, purpose, passion, and creativity.', "We’re passionate about transportation and technology. The work we accomplish fulfills a sense of meaning and purpose, which goes beyond the traditional dimensions of a workplace. Our products and initiatives directly influence people’s lives, which is proven by our customers' feedback.", 'Benefits & Perks', 'Being a data-informed company, data helps us create exceptional experiences for our customers and provide insights into the effectiveness of our product.', 'Deploy sophisticated analytics programs, machine learning, and statistical methods', 'Experience with Data modeling and warehouse design', 'We promote being a more well-rounded engineer by working on different parts of the engineering stack. We also work in very small groups to keep processes and overhead low, so we have a lot of trust and accountability to perform the work required to build the best product.\xa0', 'Build and maintain our data warehouse and data pipelines', 'Experience with realtime data streaming infrastructures like AWS Kinesis, Spark or Kafka (Confluent Platform a plus)', 'Pre-tax commuter benefits', 'Minimum of 7+ years of relevant experience in building and architecting data solutionsDeep understanding of distributed systemsExpert in SQL and high-level languages such as Python, Java, or ScalaBuilt and maintained data warehouses and ETL pipelinesExperience with Data modeling and warehouse designYou have worked with big data solutions like Redshift, Snowflake, Hadoop or HiveExperience with realtime data streaming infrastructures like AWS Kinesis, Spark or Kafka (Confluent Platform a plus)Worked with Cloud-based architecture such as AWS or Google CloudYou will be working with BigQuery, DBT, Airflow, Python, Fivetran, Kafka, git and Looker, and we welcome new ideas.', 'Founded in 2017, and now a subsidiary of Ford Motor Company, we have worked together with cities, campuses, community groups, and businesses to expand internationally. Even as we expand, we maintain the close feeling of a small business, with “fireside chats” chats led by our company’s founders, weekly OKR pop-up videos, music-infused presentations at our All Hands meetings, and more. During this time of working remotely, our creativity and shared goals have kept us united and bonded within our virtual community.']

['', 'Responsibilities:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Testing programmed screeners', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Development and execution of formal qual training programs', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in consumer research', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Produce video highlight reels and other innovative reporting deliverables', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Presenting results to clients', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaboration with clients across all phases of research studies', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Knowledge and hands on experience running qualitative projects including:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Selecting the most appropriate research methodology and techniques', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Schedule and run weekly/monthly virtual client meetings', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Proven ability to provide flawless deliverables', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Moderating remote sessions, groups, and discussions', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Review and onboarding of new qualitative tools, platforms, and partners', 'We work well together and enjoy what we do. We are looking for a team member who thrives in a creative, high-energy, fast-paced environment who can work independently and is highly productive with a commitment to the highest quality and ethical standards: someone who “gets” consumer research in today’s new media world and is driven to be the best they can with the desire to grow professionally.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with online and mobile qualitative research tools', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Manage multiple high-level client accounts and corresponding projects', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Onboarding and management of international partners/vendors', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelors or advanced degree', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Coordinating participant recruitment with the qual fieldwork team', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in quantitative research a plus', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ensuring perfection in data quality and deliverables', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience conducting UX research studies in-person and remotely a plus', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Formal moderation training/experience (e.g. RIVA)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Execution and management all phases of a research initiative—from design through report delivery', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Passionate about research and analysis', 'Position Summary:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in Youth & Family, Media & Entertainment and Technology industries a plus', 'Qualitative Researcher', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Developing activity guides', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Determining research participant qualifying criteria', 'Exciting opportunity to join a fast growing, dynamic and innovative marketing research firm. You will be joining the leader in new research technologies and innovative approaches to gaining consumer insights where every team member is considered a valued and integral component to our success. We have special expertise in digital research, the media & entertainment industry, youth and families (kids, Gen-Z, Millennials, Parents), and technology industries.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Developing and managing project schedules and budgets ensuring that all phases of a project are accomplished on schedule and on/under budget', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Practical experience with a wide array of qualitative research methodologies', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Producing topline and executive summary reports', 'We are in a rapid growth phase; become part of this exciting company and grow with us!', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Exceptional written, oral, and presentation communication abilities', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Communicating with clients to understand and document the research objectives', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Integrating secondary data sources when applicable', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Exceptional hands-on day-to-day project management skills', 'Innovation and Excellence', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Managing, mentoring, and training of project directors and associates', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Developing new methodologies to meet client project requirements as needed', 'Requirements:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Programming activities on online qual platforms (insight communities, discussion boards, diary/ethnography studies, UX studies)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A minimum of 5 years within the custom Market Research industry (supplier side)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent organizational skills with a strong focus upon managing details', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Writing qualitative screeners', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Supervising all personnel on projects', 'The Qualitative Researcher is responsible for the execution and management of all phases of a research initiative from design through report delivery and ensuring the successful execution of the research.\xa0The Qualitative Researcher takes the principal responsibility for the project running smoothly and liaising with clients and TSR management. The Qualitative Research has primary responsibility for meeting time and cost constraints, ensuring quality, providing deliverables to client satisfaction and objectives for projects assigned. Prepares the final report and deliverables or works closely with project directors and associates to ensure that report is produced per specifications and client objectives. Presents findings to client or in collaboration with the research team. Involved in proposal generation and account management. A key responsibility of the Qualitative Research is client relations and business development--expanding existing business and cultivating new business—and ensuring that our standards of excellence are always reflected in our work. The Qualitative Researcher is responsible for managing, mentoring, and training of project directors and associates in research methodology, analysis and project management. A key role is to innovate and help develop new methodologies and leverage new tools, in collaboration with the executive team, in pursuit of our mission: Innovation and Excellence.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Setting up remote IDI’s, focus groups and UX sessions', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Writing research proposals and preparing cost estimates']

job_title: Senior Data Engineer - Riot Data Products, Aggregations
job_text: ['', '2+ Years of experience developing data pipelines and data modeling.', 'Experience with software development lifecycle.', 'You will work with the data scientists and engineers on your team to develop new capabilities in the cross game problem space.', 'Senior Data Engineer on the RDP Aggregations team', 'You will partner with researchers, analysts, and advisers to ensure the time they spend transforming data to answer their questions are minimal.', 'Desired Qualifications', ' 3+ Years of professional programming experience in SQL and Python or Java. 2+ Years of experience developing data pipelines and data modeling. Experience with cloud data tools (AWS, GCP). Experience working directly with end data users and meeting their requirements. Proficiency in data structures and algorithms. ', 'Experience with cloud data tools (AWS, GCP).', 'Responsibilities', 'Experience working directly with end data users and meeting their requirements.', 'Experience developing an enterprise data warehouse spanning across multiple teams.', "It’s our policy to provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and members of Riot Games, Inc. Riot Games makes reasonable accommodations for handicapped and disabled Rioters and does not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, handicap, veteran status, marital status, criminal history, or any other category protected by applicable federal and state law, including the City of Los Angeles’ Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance relating to an applicant's criminal history (LAMC 189.00).", 'Required Qualifications', ' Experience developing an enterprise data warehouse spanning across multiple teams. Experience with software development lifecycle. Experience working collaboratively in a team environment. Experience with Spark and BigQuery. ', 'Experience working collaboratively in a team environment.', 'Experience with Spark and BigQuery.', '3+ Years of professional programming experience in SQL and Python or Java.', 'You will transform raw data to datasets that end-users can easily query.', 'You will advocate for best practices and identify opportunities for the team to improve the sustainability of our portfolio.', ' You will partner with researchers, analysts, and advisers to ensure the time they spend transforming data to answer their questions are minimal. You will transform raw data to datasets that end-users can easily query. You will work with the data scientists and engineers on your team to develop new capabilities in the cross game problem space. You will advocate for best practices and identify opportunities for the team to improve the sustainability of our portfolio. ', 'Proficiency in data structures and algorithms.', 'Our Perks']

['·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ph.D in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering or other related field', '\xa0', 'Location – Silicon Valley, CA (Remote)', 'Perks:', 'They are extremely well backed and boast one of the strongest leadership teams among companies in AI. They are looking for a Sr. Computer Vision/Deep Learning Scientist who can develop robust algorithms and be a key part of the strong foundation they are looking to build.', 'Requirements:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong software development skills', 'Salary – Up to $200k base plus benefits', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa03+ years of industry experience developing computer vision systems', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong understanding of object detection, classification and tracking', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Security Clearance (Preferred) – Due to the clients they work with, all employees need to be able to obtain and maintain security clearance', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0401k', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to work alongside the worlds top Scientist and Engineers in AI and Computer Vision', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Salary – Up to $200k Base + Robust Equity Package', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Performance Bonuses', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa04 weeks paid vacation', 'Role – Sr. Computer Vision Scientist', 'Listed as one of the most innovative tech startups in recent years, this California based startup is focused on delivering AI products and services to answer the most urgent questions surrounding intelligence and national security. Through real-time analysis of multi-media visual data, their flagship platform detects and alerts experts on specific areas, objects, and persons of interest.']
