['', '• Collaborate with product team to define objectives and improve trust and safety strategy', '• Good communication and teamwork skills, be passionate about learning new techniques and taking on challenging problems', 'TikTok is committed to providing reasonable accommodations during our recruitment process. If you need assistance or an accommodation, please reach out to us at usrc@tiktok.com.', '• Work on highly-scalable classifiers, graph models and algorithms in behavior mining, abnormal detection, and content understanding', '• Play an important role in building machine learning model for user account integrity', 'Our Trust and Safety engineering team is fast growing and responsible for building machine learning models and systems to identify and defend internet abuse and fraud on our platform. Our mission is to protect billions of users and publishers across the globe every day. We embrace the state-of-the-art machine learning technologies and scale them to detect and improve the tremendous amount of data generated on the platform. With the continuous efforts from our team, TikTok is able to provide the best user experience and bring joy to everyone in the world', "Responsibilities - What You'II Do", "We are looking for excellent machine learning engineers who can take initiatives, design and develop advanced machine learning solutions, and deploy them directly to TikTok's global platform. A successful candidate will have machine learning expertise and good software engineering skills. And you will take pride in working with engineers, product managers and business partners to identity and solve the most challenging safety and integrity problems in the internet scale.", 'Qualifications', '• Good programming skills in Python and similar languages, and a deep understanding of data structures and algorithms', 'Trust and Safety engineering team ', 'TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Mumbai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.', '• Collaborate with data analyst to understand and find data patterns', '• Hands on experience in one or more of the areas: machine learning, deep learning, pattern recognition, anomaly detection, data mining, computer vision, NLP or content understanding', '• Work with engineering teams to implement model pipeline and deploy the service at scale', '• Experience in trust and safety is a plus', "• The opening is for both Junior level and Senior level. Minimum requirement is a BS degree with 2+ years’ industrial experience, or a MS/PhD degree with 1+ years' relevant experience", "TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We believe individuals shouldn't be disadvantaged because of their background or identity, but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience. We are passionate about this and hope you are too."]

job_title: Senior UX Researcher & Staff/Lead UX Researcher
job_text: ['', 'Company', 'Influence architectural design tasks such as user flows, information architecture definition, wireframing, etc. with the aim of communicating design opportunities to the broader Design and Product teams. ', 'What You Get To Do In This Role', 'Can quickly understand customer needs, taking the initiative to interact with customers, managing expectations, responding to their requests, and communicating feedback in a simple, clear, and concise manner. ', 'Work directly with external vendors to procure research sample, research reports, and partner on research projects as needed. ', 'Text analysis and coding of open-end responses which might include product feature requests, problem reports, discussion forums, and community discussions. ', 'Apply appropriate research techniques and methods for the specific project. Methods such as individual customer interviews, focus groups, diary studies, journey mapping, user flows, information architecture definition, wireframing and others to aid in the formulation of insights that improve product functionality and user experience. ', "Represent the needs of ServiceNow customers or partners and their end users associated with ServiceNow's products, competing products, or future concepts. ", 'Willing to be proactive and take initiative to learn about ServiceNow products and customers. ', 'Execute various types of primary research and analysis, from early discovery, usage and needs, through product design validation. ', 'Work collaboratively inside a cross-functional team, effectively integrating your research into the product definition and design phases. ', 'Analyze and synthesize data in order to generate strategic and tactical insights with actionable recommendations that drive product improvements, innovations, and customer experience improvements. ', 'Ability to work independently on complex projects requiring frequent problem solving and critical thinking.', 'Prepare reports of findings, create PowerPoint and Excel reports, explaining methods used and insights learned, and presenting research results to key stakeholders and leadership (C-Level, director level). ', 'Proven history of independently defining, planning and executing research strategies including defining objectives, goals, timelines and ability to select the appropriate methodology for the project. This includes developing sample plans and designing data collection instruments. ', 'Team ', 'Min 6+ years of direct experience or equivalent combination of education and experience in user experience, product, customer, market or academic research. Preferably for product development purposes. Proven history of independently defining, planning and executing research strategies including defining objectives, goals, timelines and ability to select the appropriate methodology for the project. This includes developing sample plans and designing data collection instruments. Advanced knowledge of several data collection methods (either qualitative or quantitative) and fundamental knowledge of mixed methods. Can quickly understand customer needs, taking the initiative to interact with customers, managing expectations, responding to their requests, and communicating feedback in a simple, clear, and concise manner. Demonstrates confidence in the data collection process which is evidenced by the ability to naturally engage users and in the aptitude to respond with insightful follow-up questions which increases richness of research data. Knowledge of user interface design principles, usability evaluation techniques, perception, cognition, task analysis, experimental design and fundamental knowledge of statistics to best inform useful and usable recommendations. Advanced/Exceptional written and oral communication abilities. Can prepare reports of findings, illustrating research data graphically and translating complex findings into written text. Experience working with and presenting research results to executive leadership (C-Level, director level). Willing to be proactive and take initiative to learn about ServiceNow products and customers. Ability to work independently on complex projects requiring frequent problem solving and critical thinking.', 'Collaborate on feature definition and user story creation as needed. ', 'In Order To Be Successful, You Need To Have', 'Develop strategic research plans including discussion guides, contingency plans and other instruments from rough outline to the final version. ', 'Partner closely with Product Management to influence product strategy and roadmaps with validated user research findings. ', 'Demonstrates confidence in the data collection process which is evidenced by the ability to naturally engage users and in the aptitude to respond with insightful follow-up questions which increases richness of research data. ', 'Senior UX Researcher and Staff/Lead UX Researcher', "Represent the needs of ServiceNow customers or partners and their end users associated with ServiceNow's products, competing products, or future concepts. Collaborate with key stakeholders including designers, other researchers, and product managers to identify objectives, goals, timelines and research execution plan. Work directly with external vendors to procure research sample, research reports, and partner on research projects as needed. Execute various types of primary research and analysis, from early discovery, usage and needs, through product design validation. Apply appropriate research techniques and methods for the specific project. Methods such as individual customer interviews, focus groups, diary studies, journey mapping, user flows, information architecture definition, wireframing and others to aid in the formulation of insights that improve product functionality and user experience. Develop strategic research plans including discussion guides, contingency plans and other instruments from rough outline to the final version. Partner closely with Product Management to influence product strategy and roadmaps with validated user research findings. Collaborate on feature definition and user story creation as needed. Work collaboratively inside a cross-functional team, effectively integrating your research into the product definition and design phases. Influence architectural design tasks such as user flows, information architecture definition, wireframing, etc. with the aim of communicating design opportunities to the broader Design and Product teams. Text analysis and coding of open-end responses which might include product feature requests, problem reports, discussion forums, and community discussions. Analyze and synthesize data in order to generate strategic and tactical insights with actionable recommendations that drive product improvements, innovations, and customer experience improvements. Prepare reports of findings, create PowerPoint and Excel reports, explaining methods used and insights learned, and presenting research results to key stakeholders and leadership (C-Level, director level). ", 'Min 6+ years of direct experience or equivalent combination of education and experience in user experience, product, customer, market or academic research. ['', ' Analyze science, engineering, business and other data processing problems to implement and improve computer systems. Perform advanced SQL and SAS Programming in data warehouse environment including use of different analysis techniques or business intelligence application development. Manage, build, enhance, architect and maintain the Medicare Stars Data Engine. Process large data sets through complex ETL to our Medicare Star Data Engine. Explore, examine, and interpret large volumes of data in various forms. Perform analysis of structured and unstructured data to solve moderately complex business problems. End to end testing of the Medicare Stars data warehouse data and implement appropriate validation controls to control data quality. Develop automated data quality scripts to ensure the data integrity and completeness of the data. Design and conduct analysis and outcome studies using healthcare claims, pharmacy, and lab data, employing appropriate research designs and statistical methods. Develop, validate, and execute algorithms, data models and reporting tools that answer applied research and business questions for internal and external clients. Collaborates with client team to transform data and integrate algorithms and models into automated processes. Uses knowledge in Hadoop architecture, HDFS commands and experience designing & optimizing queries to build data pipelines. Uses programming skills in Python, Visual Studio or any of the major languages to build robust data pipelines and dynamic systems. job_text: ['', 'Project Scope', 'Excellent scientific communication and presentation skills. ', 'Equal Employment Opportunity', 'About AbbVie', 'Proven track record of teamwork, adaptability, innovation, initiative, and integrity.', 'Provide three letters of recommendation, one at least from your PI, and preferably, one from a member of the thesis committee.', 'Experience with technologies such as thin film-evaporation, spray-drying, fluid bed granulation, impinging jet microfluidics, hot-melt extrusion, nanoparticles, etc. is a plus.', 'Preferred', 'Significant Work Activities', 'Schedule', 'Basic Requirements: ', 'Learns fast, grasps the "essence” and can change course quickly where indicated', 'Qualifications', 'Design and conduct of experiments to test the proposed formulation concepts.', 'Job Type', 'Communication of project progress to governing bodies within the organization.', 'Travel', 'Thorough review of prior work in this field.', 'Builds strong relationships with peers and cross functionally with partners outside of team to enable higher performance', 'Embraces the ideas of others, nurtures innovation and manages to reality', ' Thorough review of prior work in this field. Critical analysis of data, summarization of findings, and presentation to mentoring team. Communication of project progress to governing bodies within the organization. Publish research in peer-reviewed journals and present work at scientific conferences. ', 'Maintaining a high level of productivity in the laboratory setting.', 'Key Leadership Competencies', 'NCE-Formulation Sciences Mission Statement', 'Critical analysis of data, summarization of findings, and presentation to mentoring team.', ' Familiarity with concepts of oral drug delivery. Demonstrated ability in conduct of independent research, generating original technical ideas, solving difficult technical problems, and implementing new technologies to achieve project goals.  Excellent scientific communication and presentation skills.  Provide a narrative on why your academic training would qualify you for this position and why you have a sustained interest in this program (research summary). Provide three letters of recommendation, one at least from your PI, and preferably, one from a member of the thesis committee. Proven track record of teamwork, adaptability, innovation, initiative, and integrity. ', 'Demonstrated ability in conduct of independent research, generating original technical ideas, solving difficult technical problems, and implementing new technologies to achieve project goals. ', 'Provide a narrative on why your academic training would qualify you for this position and why you have a sustained interest in this program (research summary).', 'Publish research in peer-reviewed journals and present work at scientific conferences.']

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, gender identity, national origin, physical or mental disability, protected veterans, genetic information, and sexual orientation.', 'Able to work and participate as a team member and develop productive relationships with co-workers and collaborators.', 'Collaborate with research personnel in the Division of Pathology laboratory, the NSABP Biostatistical Center, and with outside investigators with access to the NSABP Biospecimen Bank to design and analyze genomics studies with meaningful clinical aims that demonstrate rigorous statistical justification.', 'Under the administration of the Associate Director, Molecular Pathology, the Computational Biologist will contribute to the support of breast and colorectal cancer research by designing and analyzing statistically rigorous genomic and correlative science projects including next generation sequencing data.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Biostatistician with expertise in the analyses of genomics data, including those generated from gene expression arrays, sequencing, and genome-wide association studies.', 'Collaborate with NSABP translational scientist and NSABP clinical investigators for interpretation of the correlative science data and manuscript preparation.', 'Coordinates and prioritizes tasks independently and completes in a timely manner.', 'Strong working knowledge of computers and computer programming skills including R, S+, and SAS.', 'Experience/Skills', 'PhD or equivalent in Biostatistics, Bioinformatics, Computational Biology, or Systems Biology from a well-respected university.', 'Manage, normalize and prepare molecular data for export to collaborators.']

job_title: Research Scientist/Sr Research Scientist, Translational Sciences (TLS)
job_text: ['', 'Keep current with emerging trends in scientific discipline.', 'Perform image analysis and quantification to characterize target expression, interrogate tumor microenvironment and aid in tissue based biomarker identification.', 'Troubleshoot and overcome complex problems in specialized procedures.', 'Follow company safety practices, including training, lab safety, and record keeping as appropriate.', 'Completes all assigned laboratory duties in a timely manner and effectively resolves technical issues.', 'Incorporate proper quality controls and best practices to produce high-quality work.', 'Develop and execute histopathology assays including single and multiplex immunohistochemistry (IHC), in situ hybridization (ISH), both colorimetric and fluorescent, and other emerging techniques using our automated platforms.', 'Familiarity with image analysis software packages such as ImageJ, InForm, QPath, Halo or VisioPharm.', ' Develop and execute histopathology assays including single and multiplex immunohistochemistry (IHC), in situ hybridization (ISH), both colorimetric and fluorescent, and other emerging techniques using our automated platforms. Perform image analysis and quantification to characterize target expression, interrogate tumor microenvironment and aid in tissue based biomarker identification. Work as part of a cross functional team to provide tissue-based assay development for target qualification, pharmacodynamic and efficacy readouts, and biomarker development. Demonstrate a high level of scientific independence in the planning and execution of complex laboratory assignments at the project level. Independently manage workload across multiple projects while effectively aligning resources based on key priorities. Assimilate data and insight in real-time to recognize when an experimental approach needs to be adjusted/changed to deliver optimal results. Troubleshoot and overcome complex problems in specialized procedures. Incorporate proper quality controls and best practices to produce high-quality work. Develop a reputation as an insightful and impactful scientist by preparing and presenting comprehensive technical or project reports and giving formal presentations to internal audience. Keep current with emerging trends in scientific discipline. Understands the role of other functional areas in the laboratory and partners with them to maximize best practices and laboratory efficiencies. Completes all assigned laboratory duties in a timely manner and effectively resolves technical issues. Follow company safety practices, including training, lab safety, and record keeping as appropriate. ', 'Experience in digital imaging system (slide scanning and image analysis).', ' B.Sc., M.Sc. or Ph.D. in molecular biology, cellular biology or related subject area with 5+ years of experience. Experience with standard histology procedures including processing and embedding human and mouse tissue, sectioning, H&E staining and other specialty stains. Significant hands-on experience in a variety of pathology-based methodologies including IHC, multiplex IHC, ISH, immunofluorescence imaging, and digital pathology/image analysis. Strong scientific background with practical experience, and excellent verbal and written communications skills Self-motivated and highly organized with ability to work on multiple projects. Strong computer skills are essential. Excellent interpersonal skills, able to work in a team-oriented environment. ', 'Significant hands-on experience in a variety of pathology-based methodologies including IHC, multiplex IHC, ISH, immunofluorescence imaging, and digital pathology/image analysis.', 'Proficient at IHC assays for single-plex chromogenic and fluorescence, as well as multi-plex IHC and IF using our automated platforms.', 'Four or more years’ experience in molecular pathology in an industry setting.', 'Summary (Primary Function)', 'Strong computer skills are essential.', ' Incyte hiring organization processes your personal data to manage your job application in order to enter into an employment relationship with you if you are the successful candidate.During the process, you may be asked to respond to questions that will screen out your application if you do not meet certain objective criteria required by the job. You can learn more about this process here . ', 'Strong scientific background with practical experience, and excellent verbal and written communications skills', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'B.Sc., M.Sc. or Ph.D. in molecular biology, cellular biology or related subject area with 5+ years of experience.', 'Self-motivated and highly organized with ability to work on multiple projects.', 'Excellent interpersonal skills, able to work in a team-oriented environment.', 'Understands the role of other functional areas in the laboratory and partners with them to maximize best practices and laboratory efficiencies.', 'Experience in running ISH assays using RNAScope and BaseScope probes and protein/RNA profiling experiments (IHC and ISH based) using the DSP Nanostring GeoMx platform.', 'The Research Scientist/Sn Research Scientist, Translational Sciences (TLS), ', 'Understanding of the scientific basis and technical details of a variety of multiplexed imaging methods, fluorescent dyes and filters optimization, and whole slide scanning.', 'Essential Functions Of The Job (Key Responsibilities)', 'Work as part of a cross functional team to provide tissue-based assay development for target qualification, pharmacodynamic and efficacy readouts, and biomarker development.', 'Independently manage workload across multiple projects while effectively aligning resources based on key priorities.', 'Assimilate data and insight in real-time to recognize when an experimental approach needs to be adjusted/changed to deliver optimal results.', 'Experience with standard histology procedures including processing and embedding human and mouse tissue, sectioning, H&E staining and other specialty stains.', ' Four or more years’ experience in molecular pathology in an industry setting. Proficient at IHC assays for single-plex chromogenic and fluorescence, as well as multi-plex IHC and IF using our automated platforms. Experience in running ISH assays using RNAScope and BaseScope probes and protein/RNA profiling experiments (IHC and ISH based) using the DSP Nanostring GeoMx platform. Expertise in documentation, analysis, interpretation and presentation of data generated from tissue-based target expression experiments with a variety of statistical approaches. Experience in digital imaging system (slide scanning and image analysis). Understanding of the scientific basis and technical details of a variety of multiplexed imaging methods, fluorescent dyes and filters optimization, and whole slide scanning. Familiarity with image analysis software packages such as ImageJ, InForm, QPath, Halo or VisioPharm. ', 'Incyte hiring organization processes your personal data to manage your job application in order to enter into an employment relationship with you if you are the successful candidate.During the process, you may be asked to respond to questions that will screen out your application if you do not meet certain objective criteria required by the job. You can learn more about this process here .', 'Demonstrate a high level of scientific independence in the planning and execution of complex laboratory assignments at the project level.', 'Expertise in documentation, analysis, interpretation and presentation of data generated from tissue-based target expression experiments with a variety of statistical approaches.', 'Develop a reputation as an insightful and impactful scientist by preparing and presenting comprehensive technical or project reports and giving formal presentations to internal audience.', 'Qualifications (Minimal acceptable level of education, work experience, and competency)']

['', 'Responsibilities:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Testing programmed screeners', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Development and execution of formal qual training programs', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in consumer research', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Produce video highlight reels and other innovative reporting deliverables', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Presenting results to clients', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaboration with clients across all phases of research studies', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Knowledge and hands on experience running qualitative projects including:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Selecting the most appropriate research methodology and techniques', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Schedule and run weekly/monthly virtual client meetings', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Proven ability to provide flawless deliverables', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Moderating remote sessions, groups, and discussions', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Review and onboarding of new qualitative tools, platforms, and partners', 'We work well together and enjoy what we do. We are looking for a team member who thrives in a creative, high-energy, fast-paced environment who can work independently and is highly productive with a commitment to the highest quality and ethical standards: someone who “gets” consumer research in today’s new media world and is driven to be the best they can with the desire to grow professionally.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with online and mobile qualitative research tools', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Manage multiple high-level client accounts and corresponding projects', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Onboarding and management of international partners/vendors', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelors or advanced degree', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Coordinating participant recruitment with the qual fieldwork team', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in quantitative research a plus', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ensuring perfection in data quality and deliverables', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience conducting UX research studies in-person and remotely a plus', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Formal moderation training/experience (e.g. RIVA)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Execution and management all phases of a research initiative—from design through report delivery', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Passionate about research and analysis', 'Position Summary:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in Youth & Family, Media & Entertainment and Technology industries a plus', 'Qualitative Researcher', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Developing activity guides', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Determining research participant qualifying criteria', 'Exciting opportunity to join a fast growing, dynamic and innovative marketing research firm. You will be joining the leader in new research technologies and innovative approaches to gaining consumer insights where every team member is considered a valued and integral component to our success. We have special expertise in digital research, the media & entertainment industry, youth and families (kids, Gen-Z, Millennials, Parents), and technology industries.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Developing and managing project schedules and budgets ensuring that all phases of a project are accomplished on schedule and on/under budget', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Practical experience with a wide array of qualitative research methodologies', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Producing topline and executive summary reports', 'We are in a rapid growth phase; become part of this exciting company and grow with us!', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Exceptional written, oral, and presentation communication abilities', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Communicating with clients to understand and document the research objectives', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Integrating secondary data sources when applicable', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Exceptional hands-on day-to-day project management skills', 'Innovation and Excellence', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Managing, mentoring, and training of project directors and associates', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Developing new methodologies to meet client project requirements as needed', 'Requirements:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Programming activities on online qual platforms (insight communities, discussion boards, diary/ethnography studies, UX studies)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A minimum of 5 years within the custom Market Research industry (supplier side)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent organizational skills with a strong focus upon managing details', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Writing qualitative screeners', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Supervising all personnel on projects', 'The Qualitative Researcher is responsible for the execution and management of all phases of a research initiative from design through report delivery and ensuring the successful execution of the research.\xa0The Qualitative Researcher takes the principal responsibility for the project running smoothly and liaising with clients and TSR management. The Qualitative Research has primary responsibility for meeting time and cost constraints, ensuring quality, providing deliverables to client satisfaction and objectives for projects assigned. Prepares the final report and deliverables or works closely with project directors and associates to ensure that report is produced per specifications and client objectives. Presents findings to client or in collaboration with the research team. Involved in proposal generation and account management. A key responsibility of the Qualitative Research is client relations and business development--expanding existing business and cultivating new business—and ensuring that our standards of excellence are always reflected in our work. The Qualitative Researcher is responsible for managing, mentoring, and training of project directors and associates in research methodology, analysis and project management. A key role is to innovate and help develop new methodologies and leverage new tools, in collaboration with the executive team, in pursuit of our mission: Innovation and Excellence.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Setting up remote IDI’s, focus groups and UX sessions', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Writing research proposals and preparing cost estimates']

['', '• Software development experience through hands on coding in a general purpose programming language;', '• Strong experience with data structures or algorithms;', '• Understand product objectives and machine learning techniques; improve model and recommendation strategy;', 'TikTok is committed to providing reasonable accommodations during our recruitment process. If you need assistance or an accommodation, please reach out to us at usrc@tiktok.com', '• Understand content security strategy and apply ML algorithms to improve content audit process;', '• Experience in one or more of the following areas: machine learning, recommendation systems, data mining or other related areas;', 'Responsibilities', "Responsibilities - What You'II Do", 'Qualifications', '• Bachelor degree in computer science or a related technical discipline, with 2+ years of related work experience;', '• Strong communication and teamwork skills;', 'The team works on TikTok core recommendation engine. It is made up of world-class machine learning engineers to build industry-leading recommendation products using cutting-edge machine learning techniques. The team is dynamic, fast-pacing, collaborative and highly impact-driven.', 'TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Mumbai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.', '• Passion about techniques and solving challenging problems.', '• Build industry leading recommendation system; develop highly scalable classifiers and tools leveraging machine learning;', '• Understand user behavior and apply ML algorithms to optimize content consumption and production experience;', '• Work with TikTok cross functional teams to grow TikTok in important markets.', "TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We believe individuals shouldn't be disadvantaged because of their background or identity, but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience. We are passionate about this and hope you are too."]

['', ' Build and evolve the tools that empower colleagues and teams across our organization to access data and build reliable and scalable transformations.', ' We develop real products. You need to be an expert in design, coding and scripting We prioritize professional industry experience; advanced degrees alone do not replace real world experience We have massive scale. You need to have experience in distributed, scalable systems. You must have worked with modern data storage, messaging, and processing tools and demonstrated experience designing and coding in big-data components. We are a growing, diverse team and we work together on delivering a Health Cloud platform. We love to collaborate and help each other, and we want someone to share that ideology We are and need other self-starters who can see the big picture and prioritize their work to make the largest impact on the business and customers vision and requirements', ' Design and build out our digital data platform in a cloud scalable environment Able to design, build, operationalize, secure, and monitor data processing systems with a particular emphasis on security and compliance, scalability and efficiency, reliability, flexibility and portability. Architect, design, implement and support data integration patterns for enterprise-scale datasets, using Big Data technologies such as Kafka, data streaming, Spark, relational and NoSQL data stores. Establish frameworks for application integration with big data and IoT datasets, including connected devices and electronic medical records. Build and evolve the tools that empower colleagues and teams across our organization to access data and build reliable and scalable transformations. Build systems that secure and govern our data end to end: control access across multiple storage and access layers (including BI tools), track data quality, catalog datasets and their lineage, audit usage and ensure correct data semantics. Demonstrate a deep expertise of and ability to operationalize leading data technologies and best practices Provide ongoing maintenance, support and enhancements in existing systems and platforms. Collaborate cross-functionally with data scientists, business users, project managers and other engineers to achieve elegant solutions. ['', 'Responsibilities:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Testing programmed screeners', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Development and execution of formal qual training programs', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in consumer research', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Produce video highlight reels and other innovative reporting deliverables', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Presenting results to clients', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaboration with clients across all phases of research studies', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Knowledge and hands on experience running qualitative projects including:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Selecting the most appropriate research methodology and techniques', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Schedule and run weekly/monthly virtual client meetings', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Proven ability to provide flawless deliverables', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Moderating remote sessions, groups, and discussions', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Review and onboarding of new qualitative tools, platforms, and partners', 'We work well together and enjoy what we do. We are looking for a team member who thrives in a creative, high-energy, fast-paced environment who can work independently and is highly productive with a commitment to the highest quality and ethical standards: someone who “gets” consumer research in today’s new media world and is driven to be the best they can with the desire to grow professionally.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with online and mobile qualitative research tools', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Manage multiple high-level client accounts and corresponding projects', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Onboarding and management of international partners/vendors', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelors or advanced degree', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Coordinating participant recruitment with the qual fieldwork team', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in quantitative research a plus', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ensuring perfection in data quality and deliverables', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience conducting UX research studies in-person and remotely a plus', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Formal moderation training/experience (e.g. RIVA)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Execution and management all phases of a research initiative—from design through report delivery', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Passionate about research and analysis', 'Position Summary:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in Youth & Family, Media & Entertainment and Technology industries a plus', 'Qualitative Researcher', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Developing activity guides', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Determining research participant qualifying criteria', 'Exciting opportunity to join a fast growing, dynamic and innovative marketing research firm. You will be joining the leader in new research technologies and innovative approaches to gaining consumer insights where every team member is considered a valued and integral component to our success. We have special expertise in digital research, the media & entertainment industry, youth and families (kids, Gen-Z, Millennials, Parents), and technology industries.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Developing and managing project schedules and budgets ensuring that all phases of a project are accomplished on schedule and on/under budget', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Practical experience with a wide array of qualitative research methodologies', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Producing topline and executive summary reports', 'We are in a rapid growth phase; become part of this exciting company and grow with us!', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Exceptional written, oral, and presentation communication abilities', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Communicating with clients to understand and document the research objectives', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Integrating secondary data sources when applicable', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Exceptional hands-on day-to-day project management skills', 'Innovation and Excellence', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Managing, mentoring, and training of project directors and associates', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Developing new methodologies to meet client project requirements as needed', 'Requirements:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Programming activities on online qual platforms (insight communities, discussion boards, diary/ethnography studies, UX studies)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A minimum of 5 years within the custom Market Research industry (supplier side)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent organizational skills with a strong focus upon managing details', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Writing qualitative screeners', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Supervising all personnel on projects', 'The Qualitative Researcher is responsible for the execution and management of all phases of a research initiative from design through report delivery and ensuring the successful execution of the research.\xa0The Qualitative Researcher takes the principal responsibility for the project running smoothly and liaising with clients and TSR management. The Qualitative Research has primary responsibility for meeting time and cost constraints, ensuring quality, providing deliverables to client satisfaction and objectives for projects assigned. Prepares the final report and deliverables or works closely with project directors and associates to ensure that report is produced per specifications and client objectives. Presents findings to client or in collaboration with the research team. Involved in proposal generation and account management. A key responsibility of the Qualitative Research is client relations and business development--expanding existing business and cultivating new business—and ensuring that our standards of excellence are always reflected in our work. The Qualitative Researcher is responsible for managing, mentoring, and training of project directors and associates in research methodology, analysis and project management. A key role is to innovate and help develop new methodologies and leverage new tools, in collaboration with the executive team, in pursuit of our mission: Innovation and Excellence.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Setting up remote IDI’s, focus groups and UX sessions', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Writing research proposals and preparing cost estimates']

job_title: Tech Lead, Machine Learning Engineer - Trust & Safety
job_text: ['', '• Build large-scale machine learning models and deploy them to the online trust and safety system', '• Hands on experience in one or more of the following areas: machine learning, deep learning, pattern recognition, anomaly detection, data mining, computer vision, NLP or content understanding', '• Collaborate with product team to define objectives and improve trust and safety strategy', '• Good communication and teamwork skills, be passionate about learning new techniques and taking on challenging problems', '• Good programming skills in Python or similar languages', 'TikTok is committed to providing reasonable accommodations during our recruitment process. If you need assistance or an accommodation, please reach out to us at usrc@tiktok.com.', "Responsibilities - What You'II Do", "• Develop short-term and long-term machine learning and engineering strategies, define vertical domain's priority and success metrics with our motivated engineers", 'Qualifications', 'As a tech lead - machine learning engineer, you will be driving resolution for one or more trust and safety domains, such as video content detection, account misbehavior remediation, misinformation detection, and much more. A successful candidate will have hands-on machine learning and software engineering experience. Also, you will take pride in working with other tech leads, product managers and business partners to identity and solve the most challenging safety and integrity problems in the internet scale.', 'Our Trust and Safety engineering team is fast growing and responsible for building machine learning models and systems to identify and defend internet abuse and fraud on our platform. Our mission is to protect billions of users and publishers across the globe every day. We embrace the state-of-the-art machine learning technologies and scale them to detect and improve the tremendous amount of data generated on the platform. With the continuous efforts from our team, TikTok is able to provide the best user experience and bring joy to everyone in the world.', '• Identify tech direction to continuously ship production and improve the ecosystem of our platform', "• BS with 5+ years’ industrial experience, or MS/PhD with 3+ years' relevant experience", 'TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Mumbai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.', '• Experience in working on large scale production machine learning systems', '• Collaborate with data analyst to understand and find data patterns', '• Experience in trust and safety is a plus', 'Trust and Safety engineering', "TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We believe individuals shouldn't be disadvantaged because of their background or identity, but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience. We are passionate about this and hope you are too."]

Fundamental understanding of scientific principles and proven experience in essential laboratory techniques, preferably in a pharmaceutical or biotechnology industry setting is required. Significant experience in handling translational/clinical samples, PBMC processing, isolation of immune cells including T and B cell subsets, serum isolation and cryopreservation is required. Experience with cellular assays including cell culture experiments for differentiation, proliferation and functional read-outs is required. Proficiency in developing, validating and troubleshooting multi-color flow cytometry panels is required. Experience in immunological assays using ELISA, MSD and/or Singulex platforms is required. Hands-on experience with molecular biology techniques including RNA/DNA isolation, RT-PCR and Gene expression is preferred. Strong ability to work independently and develop new technical skills to meet the needs of a fast-paced environment. Good interpersonal skills and ability to work in a highly matrixed organization. ['', ' Partner with cross-functional work groups to assess the health behavior challenges associated with business outcome(s) and identify the problems to be solved and workstreams needed to address these problems. Recommend solutions and propose evidenced-based scientific requirements needed to inform and address the health behavior challenges to a business health outcome(s). Create multi-level interventions, targeting individuals and organizations across the socio-ecological model, with a lens towards achieving health equity. Implement and measure recommended solutions in different environments (e.g., test environment and real-world). Consolidate insights and new evidence to support the update and optimization of solution(s) and ensure effectiveness. Ensure consistency and scientific integrity across projects and evolve team approaches, models, and frameworks. Provide support to shape and execute dissemination strategies as needed through implementation strategies relevant to the project partner. Lead and execute through others, providing key knowledge transfer of core science principles, as necessary. Author peer-reviewed journal articles and white papers related to the product solutions, health behavior change interventions, and behavior science frameworks. ', 'Ability to travel up to 25% is required.', 'Key Job Responsibilities', 'An understanding of and ability to apply research and program evaluation methodology is required.', 'Experience working with cross-functional project teams is required.', ' A minimum of a doctoral degree is required. A focus in behavior science, social psychology, other public health-related fields, or equivalent focus in biomedical informatics as applied to health behavior is preferred. A minimum of 6 years of overall work experience is required. A minimum of 3 years of experience in the development and measurement of behavior science and/or population-based interventions to support healthcare and health outcomes is preferred. Experience in leveraging behavior theories and frameworks to design, develop, deploy and evaluate interventions is required. Experience in developing and deploying technology-based behavior change solutions is preferred. A passion for excellence and exceeding customer expectations is required. Excellent internal and external customer facing skills are required. Active listening skills, strong business acumen, and strong organizational skills are required. Excellent oral and interpersonal communication skills are required. An understanding of and ability to apply research and program evaluation methodology is required. Experience working with cross-functional project teams is required. Professional scholarly activity (e.g. conference presentations, peer-reviewed publications) is required. An understanding of and ability to apply data science methodologies is preferred. Ability to travel up to 25% is required. organizational skills are required.', 'Experience in leveraging behavior theories and frameworks to design, develop, deploy and evaluate interventions is required.', 'Ensure consistency and scientific integrity across projects and evolve team approaches, models, and frameworks.', 'A minimum of 3 years of experience in the development and measurement of behavior science and/or population-based interventions to support healthcare and health outcomes is preferred.', 'Job Description', 'Create multi-level interventions, targeting individuals and organizations across the socio-ecological model, with a lens towards achieving health equity.', 'Professional scholarly activity (e.g. conference presentations, peer-reviewed publications) is required.', 'Recommend solutions and propose evidenced-based scientific requirements needed to inform and address the health behavior challenges to a business health outcome(s).', 'A minimum of 6 years of overall work experience is required.', expectations is required.', 'Experience in developing and deploying technology-based behavior change solutions is preferred.', 'A focus in behavior science, social psychology, other public health-related fields, or equivalent focus in biomedical informatics as applied to health behavior is preferred.', 'Partner with cross-functional work groups to assess the health behavior challenges associated with business outcome(s) and identify the problems to be solved and workstreams needed to address these problems.', 'Author peer-reviewed journal articles and white papers related to the product solutions, health behavior change interventions, and behavior science frameworks.', 'A minimum of a doctoral degree is required.', 'Excellent oral and interpersonal communication skills are required.']

job_title: Associate Director, Principal Research Scientist- Immunology Discovery
job_text: ['', ' Leading a small team within discovery immunology to scientifically contribute to the discovery of novel candidate therapeutics. Identifying and validating novel targets for the treatment of immuno-inflammatory diseases. Leading early research programs to enable the execution on pre-portfolio and portfolio targets. Driving forward in in vitro and in vivo strategies for multiple projects in the portfolio. Leading and/or contributing to part of a broader teams focusing on innate immune mechanisms to develop novel therapeutics. Providing scientific leadership, mentoring and direct management of scientists within the group. Effectively working under limited supervision with a high level of autonomy. ', 'PhD in Immunology, Biological Sciences or related discipline with post-doctoral experience and at a minimum of 5 years of industry experience with a track record of project leadership. Experience leading and advancing drug discovery programs for immune and autoimmune diseases.Strong track record of publications in of peer-reviewed journalsExpertise and state of the art knowledge in early drug discovery, various functional immunological assays, multiple color flow cytometry and molecular biology.Experience with previous mentoring and supervision of scientists.Detail-oriented with strong organizational skill sets.Strong written and oral communication skills for diverse audiences including colleagues and leadership.', 'PhD in Immunology, Biological Sciences or related discipline with post-doctoral experience and at a minimum of 5 years of industry experience with a track record of project leadership. ', 'Strong written and oral communication skills for diverse audiences including colleagues and leadership.', 'Managing and mentoring scientists with their research including experimental designs data interpretation, troubleshooting and suggesting next steps.', 'Detail-oriented with strong organizational skill sets.', 'Collaboratively working in a matrix environment, present ideas, both verbally and in writing to diverse audiences including scientific colleagues and senior leadership ', 'Leading a small team within discovery immunology to scientifically contribute to the discovery of novel candidate therapeutics.', 'in vivo', 'Working in a collaborative environment where ideas can be respectfully challenged to drive scientific excellence and innovation.', ' Providing guidance to teams on biology and pharmacology for development of novel therapeutics. Managing and mentoring scientists with their research including experimental designs data interpretation, troubleshooting and suggesting next steps. Collaboratively working in a matrix environment, present ideas, both verbally and in writing to diverse audiences including scientific colleagues and senior leadership  Driving collaborations, internally and externally, with scientists from different disciplines to drive value.  Working in a collaborative environment where ideas can be respectfully challenged to drive scientific excellence and innovation. Partners with key opinion leaders (KOLs) to gain their input on emerging science in drug and biomarker research, disease knowledge, and design of clinical studies and programs.', 'Contributes to and is key member of clinical study team.Conducts medical data review of trial data, including eligibility review.Responsible for site interactions in partnership with the SRS for medical questions and education (including safety management guidelines).Responsible for assessment of key safety-related serious adverse events in partnership with the Local Safety Officer and the Medical Safety Officer and oversees safety narratives.Collaborates with the SRS and inputs into protocols, providing medical strategic oversight in protocol development (input on inclusion/exclusion criteria and other safety-related clinical considerations).Fulfills GCP and compliance obligations for study conduct and maintains required training.Ensure that the medical care given to, and medical decisions made on behalf of, subjects should always be the responsibility of a qualified healthcare provider.', 'Clinical Studies Expertise & Strategy', 'Provides ongoing medical education in partnership with CS, protocol specific training, to support study team, investigators, and others.', 'Ensure that the medical care given to, and medical decisions made on behalf of, subjects should always be the responsibility of a qualified healthcare provider.', 'Collaborates with the SRS and inputs into protocols, providing medical strategic oversight in protocol development (input on inclusion/exclusion criteria and other safety-related clinical considerations).', 'A Medical Degree (MD, DO or equivalent) is required.', 'Prior experience with clinical trials including development of protocols, case report forms, informed consent, study initiation, protocol training, and clinical data monitoring is preferred.', 'Partners with CS to support executional delivery of studies (e.g., site activation, enrollment status, as well as adjudication for protocol violations, significant, non-significant deviations, etc.).', 'Conducts medical data review of trial data, including eligibility review.', 'A minimum of 5 years of industry and prior experience with clinical development/clinical studies is preferred.', 'In collaboration with the SRP and other cross-functional team members, designs and develops clinical plans and protocols with a strong strategic focus based on knowledge of the asset/drug, disease area, and relevant science to meet regulatory and disease strategy targets. Leads the analysis of benefit/risk for clinical study protocols in a matrix team environment working in partnership with SRS.Provides medical accountability and oversight of studies.Partners with CS to support executional delivery of studies (e.g., site activation, enrollment status, as well as adjudication for protocol violations, significant, non-significant deviations, etc.).Builds relationships with Investigators and supports study site selection. Partners with key opinion leaders (KOLs) to gain their input on emerging science in drug and biomarker research, disease knowledge, and design of clinical studies and programs.Maintains a strong medical/scientific reputation within the disease area. Has in depth knowledge of etiology, natural history, diagnosis, and treatment of the disorder. Keeps up to date in the disease area via attendance at scientific conferences and ongoing review of the literature.Stays knowledgeable of development and regulatory issues related to other competitive or relevant compounds in development and how our portfolio fits into the competitive landscape.Provides ongoing medical education in partnership with CS, protocol specific training, to support study team, investigators, and others.', 'Qualifications', 'Stays knowledgeable of development and regulatory issues related to other competitive or relevant compounds in development and how our portfolio fits into the competitive landscape.', 'Ability to travel up to 25% domestically and internationally required ', 'Job Description', 'Responsible for site interactions in partnership with the SRS for medical questions and education (including safety management guidelines).', 'In collaboration with the SRP and other cross-functional team members, designs and develops clinical plans and protocols with a strong strategic focus based on knowledge of the asset/drug, disease area, and relevant science to meet regulatory and disease strategy targets. ', 'Contributes to and is key member of clinical study team.', 'Primary Responsibilities:', 'Maintains a strong medical/scientific reputation within the disease area. Has in depth knowledge of etiology, natural history, diagnosis, and treatment of the disorder. Keeps up to date in the disease area via attendance at scientific conferences and ongoing review of the literature.', 'Leads the analysis of benefit/risk for clinical study protocols in a matrix team environment working in partnership with SRS.', 'A Medical Degree (MD, DO or equivalent) is required.A minimum of 5 years of industry and prior experience with clinical development/clinical studies is preferred.Clinical experience in cardiology or pulmonology area is highly preferred.Prior experience with clinical trials including development of protocols, case report forms, informed consent, study initiation, protocol training, and clinical data monitoring is preferred.Excellent written communication, oral communication, and presentation skills are required.The individual must have demonstrated ability to work and lead in a cross-functional and matrix team environment and be flexible and adaptable.Ability to travel up to 25% domestically and internationally required ', 'Clinical experience in cardiology or pulmonology area is highly preferred.', 'Provides medical accountability and oversight of studies.', 'Medical Monitoring', 'Excellent written communication, oral communication, and presentation skills are required.', 'Responsible for assessment of key safety-related serious adverse events in partnership with the Local Safety Officer and the Medical Safety Officer and oversees safety narratives.']

job_title: Micro and Nano Technology - Postdoctoral Researcher
job_text: ['', 'Publish research results in peer-reviewed scientific or technical journals and present results at external conferences seminars and/or technical meetings.', 'Equal Employment Opportunity', 'Grow tailored diamond films for existing and new programs in high power and high-speed electronics.', 'Work closely with an interdisciplinary team consisting of engineers, technicians, and integration experts from LLNL in all aspects of device and system development, to complete project goals.', 'In this role, you will', 'Perform other duties as assigned.', 'Ability to perform as an innovative experimentalist with a broad range of experience in experimental design, measurement, and data acquisition techniques, including developing innovative solutions to scientific and technical problems.', 'Pursue independent (but complementary) research interests and interact with a broad spectrum of scientists internally and externally.', 'Significant experience with growth of semiconductor films and their characterization', 'Perform all assignments safely in accordance with ES&H, security, and business practice requirements and policies.', 'Join us and make YOUR mark on the World!', 'Company Description', 'California Privacy Notice', 'Comprehensive Benefits Package', 'Qualifications', 'Security Clearance', 'Ability to write and operate software (e.g. MATLAB, PHYTON, COMSOL, LUMERICAL, ZEMAX, LABVIEW, SOLIDWORK) for data collection and analysis', 'Collaborative, creative, inclusive, and fun team environment', 'Experience with one or more of the following areas: microfabrication, packaging, or device characterization.', 'Work for a premier innovative national Laboratory', 'Job Description', 'Proficient verbal and written communication skills to collaborate effectively in a team environment and present and explain technical information.', 'Why Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory?', 'Initiative and interpersonal skills and ability to succeed in a collaborative, multidisciplinary team environment.', 'Ability to develop independent research projects through publication of peer-reviewed literature.', 'Flexible schedules (*depending on project needs)']

['', 'Company', ' Strong grasp of quantitative data analysis and statistics', ' Generate insights from business analytics and user feedback', ' End-to-end experience with all aspects of research (study design, recruiting, moderation, analysis, reporting)', ' Collaborate with designers and product managers to solve problems with data and evidence', ' Develop ideas on new or more efficient ways to answer questions that we have about users', 'Basic Qualifications', ' End-to-end experience with all aspects of research (study design, recruiting, moderation, analysis, reporting) Knowledge of the field of human-computer interaction, experimental design, observational and field methods and data analysis A strong portfolio demonstrating past work experience and deliverables (e.g.: white papers, case studies, study design documents, reports) The ability to understand, analyze, and interpret complex data The ability to manage ambiguity, work autonomously, and multi-task in an agile environment Excellent communication, presentation, interpersonal, and analytical skills; the ability to communicate complex concepts clearly and persuasively across different audiences and varying levels of the organization Demonstrated ability to coordinate projects across functional teams, including engineering, merchandising, design, marketing, finance, and operations Demonstrated thought-leadership with a passion for translating data into action Strong grasp of quantitative data analysis and statistics Experience in multimodal systems design research A thorough understanding of the relationship between business, technology and user experience and role of user research', ' Work across all of Amazon to drive better research practices', ' Plan and execute a wide variety of research activities with candidates and Amazon employees, using both qualitative and quantitative methods', ' 6+ years professional experience in related field.', ' A thorough understanding of the relationship between business, technology and user experience and role of user research', ' Knowledge of the field of human-computer interaction, experimental design, observational and field methods and data analysis', ' The ability to manage ambiguity, work autonomously, and multi-task in an agile environment', ' Oversee research projects conducted by outside vendors', ' Demonstrated ability to use research to influence strategic direction', ' Demonstrated thought-leadership with a passion for translating data into action', ' Excellent communication, presentation, interpersonal, and analytical skills; the ability to communicate complex concepts clearly and persuasively across different audiences and varying levels of the organization', ' A strong portfolio demonstrating past work experience and deliverables (e.g.: white papers, case studies, study design documents, reports)', ' 6+ years professional experience in related field. Broad knowledge of research methodologies and the proven ability to execute the right methodology to get the needed result Demonstrated ability to use research to influence strategic direction Experience with continuous delivery and an understanding of how to impact design and product decisions in a fast-moving and fast-changing development environment A deep understanding of UX research, agile UX, and user-centered design', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Demonstrated ability to coordinate projects across functional teams, including engineering, merchandising, design, marketing, finance, and operations', ' Build resources and train UX designers to enable them to execute their own research projects', ' The ability to understand, analyze, and interpret complex data', ' A deep understanding of UX research, agile UX, and user-centered design', ' Broad knowledge of research methodologies and the proven ability to execute the right methodology to get the needed result', ' Experience in multimodal systems design research', ' Experience with continuous delivery and an understanding of how to impact design and product decisions in a fast-moving and fast-changing development environment', 'Description', ' Plan and execute a wide variety of research activities with candidates and Amazon employees, using both qualitative and quantitative methods Generate insights from business analytics and user feedback Develop ideas on new or more efficient ways to answer questions that we have about users Collaborate with designers and product managers to solve problems with data and evidence Oversee research projects conducted by outside vendors Build resources and train UX designers to enable them to execute their own research projects Work across all of Amazon to drive better research practices']

['', 'Ability to work independently with little supervision while maintaining a high level of efficiency.', 'Experience developing presentations for others and participation in presentations on work progress and work products to management and sponsors. ', 'Awareness of commercially available software for simulation of physical processes in particle accelerators (for example the Los Alamos Accelerator Code Group collection of accelerator design codes).', 'Coordinate with mechanical and electrical engineers to develop, per project performance objectives, system component designs and their interfaces. ', 'Experience working in a testing or development environment of particle accelerator systems or prototypes. ', 'Coordinate with team leadership (Principle Investigator, Program Manager, Scientists, Engineers, and team leads) to develop project schedules and costs, and to assess technical risks and opportunities.', 'Coordinate with support staff to manage procurement, security, and safety requirements.', 'Experience with design, troubleshooting, and safety of high voltage systems. ', 'Research and propose potential sources of materials, components, and fabrication. Make recommendations to project team.', 'Six years of experience comprised from any combination of work, academic or scientific research involving physics, nuclear physics, and/or radiation-producing devices / detectors', 'Good oral and written communication skills.', 'Required Education And Experience', 'Active DoD SECRET or TOP SECRET or equivalent security clearance.', 'One year experience with particle-in-cell simulation codes. Experience may include one or more of the following commercial software packages: LSP, ICEPIC, MAGIC, Chicago.', 'Experience with one or more of the following program languages: Python, MatLab, Mathematica, Maple. ', 'U.S. Citizenship status is required as this position needs an active U.S. Security Clearance as of day one of employment.', 'Experience with monitoring, shielding, and safety aspect of working with ionizing radiation. Graduate school experience is applicable. ', 'Experience with Microsoft Office products (Word, Excel, and/or Power Point).', 'U.S. Citizenship is required', 'Contribute to technical report preparation and presentations to Raytheon Technologies management and customers.', 'Ability to cooperate and communicate with project management, engineering, and procurement groups.', 'More than two years demonstrated experience relevant to particle accelerator technologies which include electron sources, particle accelerators (linear or circular), high voltage and/or pulsed power, high power radio frequency sources and applications, particle beam and radiation diagnostic instrumentation, and vacuum systems. Graduate school experience is applicable. ', 'Two years of experience with the physics and technology of particle accelerators', 'Desired Skills/experience', 'Principle Duties And Responsibilities', 'Ability to thrive in a challenging, dynamic environment. Must be flexible and quick to adapt to sudden changes and issues.', 'Graduate school experience is applicable. ', 'One-year experience with radiation transport codes such as MCNP or ITS.', 'Familiarity with Los Alamos Accelerator Code Group (LAACG) design codes, e.g. POISSON, SuperFISH, PARMELA, TRACE, PARMTEQ.', 'Experience using physics-based simulation modeling, mathematics and analysis of conceptual and prototype particle accelerator systems.', 'Experience presenting work progress and work products to team members and project leadership. ', 'Specific experience in one or more of the following: radiofrequency systems and instrumentation, high power microwave (HPM) systems, pulsed power, data acquisition and analysis, and radiation environments. Graduate school experience is applicable.', 'Two years or more experience in physics-based modeling, simulation, and analysis of conceptual and prototype systems. Graduate school experience is applicable.', 'Coordinate with scientists and engineers to determine subsystem and system performance and mechanical requirements. ', 'As evidenced by the interview and references, a demonstrated passion for accelerator physics, innovation, and a future with Raytheon.', 'Ability to work in an interdisciplinary team setting.']

['', 'Experience developing presentations for others and participation in presentations on work progress and work products to management and sponsors. ', 'Ability to work in an interdisciplinary team setting.', 'Ability to work independently with little or no supervision while maintaining a high level of efficiency.', 'Experience in one or more of the following: radiofrequency systems and instrumentation, high power microwave systems, pulsed power and high voltage, data acquisition and analysis, and radiation environments.', 'Three years or more experience in physics-based modeling, simulation, and analysis of conceptual and prototype systems. ', 'Collaborate with project personnel to design prototypes and optimize the fabrication, integration, and commissioning the DE hardware: injectors, beamlines, high power microwave systems, accelerators, targets, and beam diagnostics.', 'Required Education/Skills', 'Six years of demonstrated experience relevant to accelerator technologies which may include electron sources, particle accelerators, high voltage, pulsed power, high power radio frequency sources and applications, particle beam and radiation diagnostic instrumentation, and vacuum systems.', 'Good oral and written communication skills.', 'Minimum of four (4) years of experience in designing and optimizing particle accelerator components and interfacing with engineering on the mechanical design and fabrication of accelerator devices. Industrial experience is a plus.', 'Minimum of eight (8) years of experience comprised from any combination of work, academic or scientific research involving physics, nuclear physics, and/or radiation-producing devices / detectors', 'Based on theoretical designs and simulations, assist with developing component, subsystem, and system mechanical requirements and designs by working with scientists, engineers, and designers/draftspersons. ', 'Active DoD SECRET or TOP SECRET or equivalent security clearance.', 'Experience with power electronics, and pulsed power systems.', 'Ability to work independently with little to no supervision while maintaining a high level of efficiency.', 'Experience with monitoring, shielding, and/or safety aspect of working with ionizing radiation.', 'Experience with one or more of the following program languages: Python, MatLab, Mathematica, Maple. ', 'Experience with radiation transport codes such as MCNP or ITS.', 'U.S. Citizenship status is required as this position needs an active U.S. Security Clearance as of day one of employment.', 'U.S. Citizenship is required', 'Experience with experimental physics, data acquisition, and signal processing.', 'Ability to cooperate and communicate well with project management, engineering, and procurement groups.', 'Ability to thrive in a challenging and dynamic environment. Must be flexible and quick to adapt to sudden changes and issues.', 'Desired Skills/experience', 'Principle Duties And Responsibilities', 'Familiarity with Los Alamos Accelerator Code Group (LAACG) design codes, e.g. POISSON, SuperFISH, PARMELA, TRACE, PARMTEQ.', 'Assist with troubleshooting and maintenance of particle accelerator prototypes on test stands while mentoring mechanical, electrical, and software engineers the basics of operation of accelerator hardware.', 'Experience presenting work progress and work products to team members and project leadership. ', 'Proven ability to use commercially available software for simulation of physical processes in particle accelerators.', 'Minimum of four (4) years of experience in physics and technology of particle accelerators.', 'Lead the effort to develop models and perform simulations to predict system performance for comparison with project requirements.', 'Experience with particle-in-cell simulation codes. Such experience may include one or more of the following commercial software packages: LSP, ICEPIC, MAGIC, CHICAGO.', 'Document prototype specifications and procedures to support engineering, manufacturing, and quality teams.', 'Experience in the design, troubleshooting, and/or safety of high voltage systems.']

['', 'Citizenship And Clearance Requirements', ' Build end-to-end ETL pipelines to enable training and operationalization of machine learning models. Build code for ingesting data from relational databases, NoSQL database, flat files, and message queues into big data solutions. Integrating the code, produced by data scientists, into data pipelines. Build code or configuration to push data from big data solutions into reporting tools and other software.
